Fantastic customer experience! We purchased a new 350L Jewell Tank from Lincs after visiting the store. All of the staff were friendly and helpful and we thought we would rather buy from a local store with good service than roll the dice and order from eBay etc for the sake of a £20 saving. We are so glad we did. Through no fault of Lincs, Jewell had uncharacteristically made some errors with the cabinet and the box contained the wrong parts. We called Lincs and they arranged for a cabinet to be opened up in the showroom and drove the missing parts over on the same day! Special thanks to Ben in the warehouse who could answer my pre-sales questions on the tanks like an expert and arranged for delivery on the day that suited us over the phone. We will definitely buy from Lincs in the future and won't hesitate to recommend them.

Decent whelping box for single use, used it for about 10 weeks in total without issue. Price is OK for the amount of use you get out of it. You certainly get value for money. You could buy a plastic one but you would be looking at 2 to 3 times the cost.

As the clamps are only required to be used for 2 mins max, DON'T buy packs of 10 (we had to buy a pack of 5 separately). The collars are of no use until the pups are several weeks old, BUT the pump to clear the airway was invaluable in our case. The scissors came in handy, but as the mother was VERY keen to eat the placenta, I found it best to squeeze the cord really hard to stop her ripping it from each pup and then cutting it ASAP prior to putting a clamp on. All in all, good value for money. Hope this information is of help from first-time breeders.

The Kan Teq body protector has an excellent quality and design seldom seen in modern products. I bought this vest because it stood out from all of its competitors in many ways. First, it has a more robust protective foam made by Knox, a leader in motorcycle safety technology. This foam provides a better force dispersion of a direct hit from falling on an object like a rock, and unlike the PVC nitrile in other body protectors it does not need to be replaced every few years or after a fall (making this a cost effective purchase for that reason alone). The panels are held by a very light and stretchy fabric that can easily be replaced to add years more use of the vest. It comes with shoulder protectors that protect the bony prominences of the shoulders and collar bones. The fit is customized according to bust, waist, and height measurements, therefore you do not need the adjustments of straps, buckles, or velcro. The result is a clean, sleek profile and a fit that is unsurpassed. I am 4'11", a height that requires customization in nearly everything and limits me to a very few products that fit the way they are designed to. The owner of the company, Wendy, made an international call to confirm my measurements, my saddle and riding style, and to answer any questions. The body protector was customized by her, and sent from the UK to Texas in under 7 days. I am very impressed. Wendy is committed to her product in every way, and she has created something that I feel is the safest, most cost effective, and sleekest looking body protector on the market.

I love my Kanteq protectors. I have two as I spend a lot of time in France.  They are worth every penny,  because if you injure yourself you risk losing everything.  I have had mine for about 5-6 years now, and they are still as good as the day I bought them. On first inspection they appear heavy, and potentially hot. Neither is true in practice. Once on and fitted the protector feels light and snug. They have a lot of movement in them. I regularly ride in Southern France where the temperature can be 35 degrees in the open, have ridden in Morocco and more recently on safari in South Africa when the temperature was at least 30 degrees,  absolutely no problem with overheating.  I suspect that in these circumstances the protector insulates against the heat in fact, and it certainly protects against UV light. And they do what it says on the tin! I came off on a mountain path a year or two ago as my horse spun, falling flat on my back onto rocks. I was aware of rock thudding into the small of my back but the impact was spread by the protector. I woke the next day without the expected pain after a jolt of that kind, no bruising at all  and I should add that I was in my early 60's so no spring chicken either! And the company are brilliant, friendly, helpful advice, fast responses. what more could one want!
Best and safest body protector I've ever had. Extremely comfortable and made to measure. Very superior to others on the market

Previous to my Harmony I had been riding in a Tucker Equitation, which I did love, but being a little "deficient" in the bottom area myself, decided to give the Harmony a try.  Where I couldn't make it through a long trail ride before, now I can with ease.  It is easily the most comfortable saddle I have ever owned.  The quality of the saddle is beautiful, if I ever have questions Tori is always willing to answer them. I now want to add some silver for the showing and a few extra rings for trail riding, and it is going to be no problem. My horses are very comfortable in the Harmony, it gives them the freedom to move, and it gives me the freedom to move the next day after a lot of riding!
My Harmony saddle is everything I wanted I show and trail ride with it.  It is amazingly comfortable for me and my horse. I have had many horses and many saddles. This one is the best I have had.

It not only fit her, it also fits on my wide-backed MFT as well.  And as for me, I love the feel of the seat, so well padded it is like sitting in a comfy chair!

I purchased a saddle last year to show in. My initials were custom tooled exactly the way I had sketched it on paper. It turned out amazing! I liked the fit, and comfort of the seat so much, I bought a second saddle to lesson in. Also, Tori was easy to work with when trying to make decisions regarding the available options. I highly recommend Western Dressage Riding Gear.

I purchased a Harmony Western Dressage Saddle because I needed a saddle that really fit my fox trotter.  The flex tree not only fits both of my fox trotters, but my friend's quarter horse. Tori is an amazing women who understands the horse industry and the unique riders that populate it.  She answers questions, helps guide you, and sends updates while your saddle is being made.  Fun experience!  I plan to be riding my saddle for decades!

The best customer service I have ever dealt with.  They even provided a cell phone contact for me to call with any questions during my saddle trial time, and were available to answer my questions. The wonderful service continued after I purchased my saddle.  Now I can say that the exceptional quality of my Harmony saddle matches the customer service. My horses attitude has greatly improved now that he is comfortable under saddle.  Thank you Western Dressage Riding Gear!

I needed a light weight saddle with a wide gullet.  So ordered one from saddle on line.  It fits my horse and is 20 lbs.  The price was okay.  The leather is not very good quality compared to our leather on most US saddles.  It has a finish on it that scratches easily and is showing some cracking. But I am keeping it because of the light weight factor.  I took it to a saddle maker and these are the suggestions that he fixed or told me how to fix. You do have to make a couple of modifications though to make the whole saddle work.  The Latigo strap keeper (the cinch strap on the left side)  needs to be unscrewed, the the top of the leather keeper cut off to be able to move the keeper higher and towards the front of the saddle by about a half inch otherwise it rubs on your knee as you ride. It is easy to rescrew back on with two new holes in the reconfigured keeper.  Omearn the right side they used the same cut out keeper for a cinch tie up.  It doesn't work that way so you have to punch a round hole to put your cinch latch through to hold it up.  I've soaked the stirrups for several hours and twisted the stirrups.  Use a two by four board not the old fashioned broomstick (not strong enough) weigh the board down(I used paint cans) after twisting the stirrups several times.  He recommended leaving it twisted for 5 -6 days to really let the laqued leather and webbing dry.  Those are the saddle maker's recommendations to help make this saddle comfortable.  He also recommended replacing the thin Latigo on the left with a thicker leather one but the right one is fine. The screws used in the back are probably okay because of the thickness of a saddle pad, a single thickness blanket may not prevent soreness. Just be careful.
It really works!!! I had never used the products myself but heard the amazing things it does for horses but getting the clothes for me were amazing and now I know my horse needs it too!

I ordered a shoulder guard for my gelding. For the past month or so, he had been shifting to keep us currying the muscle right above his shoulder and stretching his neck. He's retired, so a comfort, not a work issue, but he was obviously stiff and sore. I felt like I was kneading dough, longer, frankly, than I wanted to! I used the guard for three nights, about three hours each time, right after he went into his stall and then pulled it at the ten o'clock check. It was easy to put on and off and he didn't react at all. This sounds so weird but for the past three nights without wearing the guard, he no longer reacts when we curry his shoulder or neck. BOT says I can use it for the same length of time under the winter blanket he'll use pretty soon, if he starts getting sore again. Just knowing I have a tool to address what has been a pretty constant cold weather issue for him is fantastic. I also have a pair of BOT boots I've used if he or my mare get and stay stocked up and they take care of it.
I just bought and used the BOT dog coat.  hock wraps for my dog.  I used it after agility runs .  loved it. my dog stayed warm and quiet. I also bought socks for me and love them as well!!

I was super excited to get to my BOT so fast and I love love love the turnout blanket. All 4 of our horses have the turn-out and the mesh sheets/neck covers. The turn-out sheet is super durable and perfect for our weather.

Customer service is good.  Very cheap saddle and the moderator won't post any real reviews on their website about the saddles.  There were post that said that the saddle was high quality like a $2,000 saddle.  Not TRUE!  This saddle is made in India.  Very cheap!!!!!!!  The worst part is if you don't like it shipping will cost you $115 to return.  The saddle does not fit any horses properly.  It is cheap leather, very stiff, dry and cracking.  They spray the saddle with a shiny lacquer. Because the saddle does not fit the horse properly it tends to throw the rider forward when riding.  Not very secure like a saddle should be. You are better off spending the money on a good used quality saddle. UPDATE 7/18: Customer service reached out to me and sent me a shipping label to pay for the shipping.  I was impressed with how their customer service handled my dissatisfaction. I would suggest before you purchase actually speak with someone in sales. I updated my 1 star to a 3 star because of their customer service but the product is still not a well-made saddle.

Stealing my money!!! Ordered a coat and returned it. Still waiting for refund 45 days later. They have n o excuse except to blame it on my bank...which is not correct, as I work in the POS industry.  As of now they have stolen from me, and they do not care at all. Horrible!

But as soon as I opened the box it was perfect, seat was comfy and the fleece was very soft and well padded. I had also gotten a Girth and a pad to go with my new saddle and they were equally nice. Overall my shopping experience with saddle online was excellent and easy. I’m glad they have a knowledgeable helpful staff to help me. I would buy from them again.
I bought this saddle for my daughter for Christmas. It arrived promptly and was even prettier than what was in the picture. She is going to love it!!

Trauma Void is replacing my helmet because of my chin strap issues. amazing that they are standing behind their product this way! I really like the fit and comfort of the helmet. Unfortunately the chin strap is a problem. It doesn't stay tight, and the daily adjustment means I have to remove the little chin pad, which is losing it's stickiness and not wanting to stay put anymore. The extra length of the strap requires that pas to not be sloppy. This is a shame because otherwise it is a fantastic helmet.
Comfortable, well-ventilated helmet that seems well made. I just wish the style was a little more flattering to the wearer... it has quite a high profile.
I have the Trauma Void Lynx and I love it! The dial fit is great because as I wear it for hours at a time, I can adjust the fit which has cut back on headaches. I just wish it had a wider brim.
Fits great. Very sleak
The EQ3 was too shallow for me, but the Lynx fits perfectly. Very comfortable - and safe!
Very comfortable and  wear all day while riding or doing trail work.  My previous helmet another brand made my head hurt within 2 hours and didn't have the protection.
Very comfortable helmet especially considering it’s fabulous safety feature.
Love love love my new helmet! Fits perfectly and is very comfortable!

Love this helmet. Very comfortable. 4 stars only because I haven’t been able to try it in the heat of summer and not sure of its breathe ability. Nor have I had a fall with it on but not planning to test that

Hi, this is by far the nicest helmet I've owned. Beautiful detailing...very high quality. That being said, that is not why I made the purchase. The MIPS technology is what sold me. The helmet comes with an extra removable liner which is nice. I love the strap system. Very secure and easy to adjust.

I bought this helmet after a bad fall because I wanted the best protection for my head.  This is a beautifully made high-quality helmet, extremely comfortable, great secure fit, and has provided me with the confidence that I have the best protection I can get.  Worth every penny.

I had a fall wearing my trauma void helmet that resulted in 12 broken ribs, 4 cracked vertebrae, a broken c7, a ruptured spleen and a small hemopneumothorax.  I had no head injury!  The Trauma team at Dartmouth Hitchcock Medical Center said they always expect a head injury when someone is life-flighted in.  Thank-you trauma void!

Love the fit, overall shape, harness connection, and the little bit of blinged cord on the model I purchased.  Competitivly priced. The only thing I would suggest is enlarging the storage bag that came with it and making it from more sturdy material.  After only 2 uses it started coming apart and fraying at the seams while trying to (gently) get the helmet into the bag.

I love my traumavoid a lot! It fits me perfectly and I love how comfortable it is the second I put it on the go ride. The helmet is super classy looking and I’m looking forward to showing in it on the hunter/jumper circuit this year and years to come.

I have been trail riding for several years. Have always been a fearful rider. Always wore a helmet. Five years ago my son ended up with a  Trumatic brain injury, that was work related(steel erection welder). Ever since then my confidence that I did have when riding went down the drain. I have become very  hyper vigilant in safety since then. Sometimes to much. So when I saw your new helmets with the MIPS i was all in. My son has the lasted technology in helmets in the motorcycle world and he has sent me stuff about your technology. Thank you for starting to change the  equestrian world. It does help knowing that I  do have more advanced technology on my head. Please continue to improve the  equestrian  Helmets. Sincerely Maria PS My son had a 10% chance of living, and if he did live they didn’t know what his life would be like. He is our miracle. Not only is he alive but  physically  Back to what he was doing prior to the accident. His  challenges are in the mental part PTSD short term memory...... But doing well, holding a job. We are greatfull and blessed. He was 20 when this happened.

After some research to find the safest helmet, I purchased the Trauma Void helmet.  After owning helmets costing 3 times as much as the Trauma Void i would never consider another helmet again.  This helmet is super comfortable, light weight, and great looking.  Thank you for making such a wonderful product with the ultimate in safety.
Comfortable and stylish helmet!  Fast and reliable customer service. Highly recommended
Excellent helmet. Very comfortable, even in Florida.
I got the new lynx it is so comfortable and stylish! Came quickly too!!
Love the safety, but hard to fit helmet to my head.  had to have 2 separate fittings at Dover Saddlery to hopefully get it to fit right. Before that it was sliding at faster gaits.
bla bla bla bla bla2
Thanks you! very good and fast service. for more people like you, I will contact you often.
Great company! I live in FL and got my animo jackets quickly and for a great deal. Showed in them at HITS last wk.
up-to-date with sharing where my package is. sent right away! beat other packages i bought days before. Everything came as expected - nothing broken and what i bought was all included! Thanks!
Products came in the mail very fast! Customer service employees are also very helpful Hope you guys get new inventory soon, I love your store!
Fantastic shopping experience! My purchases were high quality and received them quickly. Love Paradise Tack and would recommend them to everyone!
Great sale!! They are very busy but they get things done Love the selection of products Keep it up paradise!!
Found what I had been looking for,  at 2/3 the retail price!   Fast delivery, and free shipping for my item. I’m quite pleased.
Fast shipping and great customer service!
I will be ordering from you again. great prices and good service!!! Thanks Karen
Great prices, super-fast shipping.  Excellent shopping experience!
Great service beyond expectations. Exemplariey!
Always super helpful, great deals and discounts, and fast, free shipping.
Love the customer service! They were very helpful in describing a particular breech and I bought two pairs of them and they were as described. They are just what I was looking for!
Super Fast Shipping  !

I placed an online order for a helmet for my daughter for Christmas. It came as ordered, in a very timely manner and well-packaged. They had a great special going on for points toward future purchases that led to a second purchase of a new pair of breeches that my daughter chose and loves as well.
The product I wanted was in stock, timely shipped, and as described.
Employees are wonderful and very helpful I love the customer service! Thanks guys ❤️

Paradise Farm & Tack, has a good selection of products and some good deals.  I love the rewards program.  The only issue I've had with them is their lack of communication when orders are back ordered or delayed and for me it's a pretty big issue.  I do not feel I should have to call every time I order to find out that my orders have been delayed. However, I was pleased to get a response to my email, personally inquiring as to ideas I felt could help to smooth this issue out. To me that shows they DO want to resolve the issue and actually do want my business.  Other than that 1 issue it's a good company.
Super fast shipping. Great transaction

Outstanding Place to Find Your Next Pet! Everything about working with this organization was outstanding! The easy-to-use and navigate website, the photos and descriptions of adoptable pets, the ease at which you connect with current owners and can set up meet n' greet rendezvous - every is truly fantastic.

He was suppose to come with paper work age and shot record. I didn't get anything and had to have all his shots given again because there was no way of knowing anything. Still dont even know is exact age.

Get Your Pet is an incredible online platform that allows adopters to adopt pets directly from guardians. My niece and I were able to browse pets that we were interested in adopting. The site also provides all the necessary information about pets from personal information to habits, training and health details once you've clicked on a pet you're interested in adopting. This platform is cost effective and intimate because we got to meet the pet owners in person and fell in love with the dog all over again. I can't stress enough how awesome my experience was using getyourpet.com.
We are very happy with our new puppy.
I can't express how lucky we are to have the best dog for our family.

Great site to connect for adoption.  Fee is very reasonable considering the perks.  I adopted my forever dog from here and was very happy with the process.  It's nice to allow a venue for both adopters and adoptees to mutually share in the solution of rehoming.
The dog I adopted was the best dog I have ever owned. He was well trained and very obedient and loving.
I really liked being able to text the owner questions and meet them.  I would use and recommend this service again. We are so happy with our loving pet!

We had been trying for a year to get a pet through various rescues but the pets we wanted were always given to someone else. It was a very frustrating experience, especially after being told we were definitely approved. I found this service when I Googled “re-homing a pet.” The website is very easy to use and only showed the pets fitting the parameters we put in. We found a dog right away and after conversations with the owners, decided to set up the time to meet him. We met the owners and the dog but did not take him then. A few days later, we made arrangements to get him and paid the required fee. We took advantage of the free vet visit after the fact of adoption. That was probably the only part that we did not care for. The vet was very “disengaged” and because it is company-owned, we were quoted astronomical prices for various services we were encouraged to buy. We did get the vaccinations because the dog needed them, but left with the intention of finding a different vet altogether. All in all, though, our experience with Get Your Pet was very positive and I would use it again. I’ve also told several friends about it!

My family had a great experience with Get Your Pet! I was able to converse with Charlies previous owners and make sure he was the right match for our family and that we were right for him. We've had Charlie for a full year now and have to say that we are super happy with Charlie and so glad we found him on Get Your Pet. I tell everyone looking for a pet to look here first to keep pets out of the shelters!  This is a great program 😊

Get your pet is the best online place I think there is. I tried several and this one definitely deserves a 5 * rating. They aren't in it for the money, they truly care that the pet gets a good home and they care about the owner as well. I highly recommend them!
I think it is great!!! We are so happy with our experience!!!

I like this service, since an owner gets to meet the prospects and they can keep in touch, if wanted, and it gives them peace of mind that their pet, will go to a loving home, and not to a shelter, where they might live in lonelyness for a long time, and there is that possibility, they could be put down, if no one adopts. ALSO, the adoption fee is only $99. Some shelters charge $250 to $450 adoption fees.

This was so very different than adopting from a shelter.  Being able to meet the owners of their dog and learning all about the dog firsthand is wonderful.  We met our dog and spent quite a bit of time with him.  I also think it is better for the owners so that they can choose who they think is best for their dog firsthand also.  Still not an easy thing to give up your pet however the owner gets peace of mind.  Our dog has been a blessing and we are thankful.

It was so easy to find our new family member, Zeus, thru getyourpet.com.  I put the criteria in for what we were looking for and the first email I received a couple days later was a perfect match, Zeus!  I really like that this is a site for rehoming pets that personally owned the pet and just had a circumstance requiring them to find a new home.  I went to several foster organization sites and always had a reason why their dogs could not be a part of our family.

We are very fond of our Pancake and feel lucky to have found her on Ger Your Pet. The only concern I have is really no ones fault but I would encourage anyone who explores this way of getting a dog do a lot of research about the families reason for getting rid of their pet. I realize I did not know much about territorial aggression and what it means as you adopt the dog. It has been a learning experience. In reality though Pancake is doing very well and she is very happy as our we.

The process of finding a dog was easy and quick. Within 3 days, I found the dog we wanted, set up a time to meet and a week later we gained our newest furbaby, BruceWayne. Get Your Pet was a great site!
We have had Audi since January. We love him and We were pleased with the process. We are an older couple and we were getting the run around from other sources. Thank you so much for our great friend.

We got our wonderful dog Riley through your service-otherwise we would not have found her. My wife and I actually developed a very nice relationship with her previous owners.I like this way of keeping an animal out of the shelters while looking for a good owner. I highly recommend your site.

I adopted a dog from this site and was told they were never home and wanted to find a new home because of this. Said there was one incident of chewing woodwork. I have had dogs my entire life and felt it would be east to fix as I am home all the time - so no separation anxiety to cause this. I have had this dog for almost a year. He is a beautiful dog and doesn't have a mean bone in his body. That's where it ends. He is so destructive. He literally does not listen to anything!!! He has dog hole everywhere in my large fenced-in back yard. He is very rough. If I try to go to him, he zig zag so I can't catch him. If I am standing in his way, he runs right into me. I thought having him neutered would help - nothing changed. He and my other dog are in large cages only for time-outs so I can get things done. If he doesn't get let out when he wants out, he tips his entire water bowl on the floor of kennel. If he does not get his way, he dumps his water. If he is outside and I call him, he will either stand there and look at me or lat down. I believe he has had these habits all along and wanted to get him another home. Previous owner said dog did not act this way when they had him. I think the above problems were the reason they wanted to find him another home. This dog is impossible and does not listen to anything. I have never had a problem like this with any dog. The bad thing is that you have to believe what owner tells you and there is no middle-man to see if what owner says is true. I may have to get him another home. H
Great service guys.... Love the way you serve... Thumbs up
Great service overall with outstanding communication throughout the journey. Could not have asked for a better pet shipper. Keep it up!
Outstanding service!!!!  I always know my pets are in the best care!!!  Detailed notes on the care given and so much love for your furry friends.  I highly recommend Choices Pet Sitters!

Both the owner and the staff are committed, very knowledgeable and trained, and enthusiastic about what they do--the very best pet sitter (AND trainer) I've ever had the pleasure of working with to take care of my canine companions!

5 stars! We highly recommend Choices Petsitters. Linda Ross knows everything about dogs and their behavior. Our dog is very cautious around other dogs and most people but absolutely loves Linda. She takes him on long, leisurely walks, plays “find it” and has other activities to keep him entertained when we have to be away. Linda and her team are consummate, comprehensive professionals, not just casual sitters or dog walkers. Worth every penny to have the very BEST dog care and to know Mulligan is safe and happy with his other mom when I’m not able to be home with him.

What I appreciate most about Choices Pet Sitters is Linda Ross. Linda is a professional! Pet sitting is not Linda’s side job-it’s what she loves. She is extremely good at it, so good , in fact that on my latest five-day trip, my Rat Terrier didn’t even give me a guilt trip when I got home! Linda Is extremely professional, responsible and caring. Her scheduling system is very easy to use and she provides very personalized care-easy to reach and gives detailed updates after each visit. I will continue to use Linda with Choices Pet Sitters and highly recommend to anyone who is looking for someone to care for their Fur Babies!

I can't recommend Kitty Angels more highly; we have used them several times to look after our two tempermental cats and it's such a relief to know they are happy and well-cared for. They are normally so shy and it always makes me laugh when I'm away and the photos from Kitty Angels come through showing them happily fussing around their Kitty Angel visitor. We're planning a longer holiday next year because we know we don't need to worry about our cats missing us. Huge thanks to Rachel and the team for fitting us in at dreadfully short notice this time when we had to race off for a family emergency

I've been using South Birmingham Kitty Angels for several years now and can't fault them. My cat isn't the easiest but they genuinely seem to adore him and he's always so happy and chilled when I get back home. They administer his medication, clean his litter tray, will Hoover up any mess he's made and clean up any accidents. I get updates twice a day on a dedicated WhatsApp group and they have demonstrated they cope well in an emergency when my cat managed to declaw him while I was on holiday! I couldn't be happier with the service, thank you Rachel & Team :-)

Consistently excellent service from Rachel and South Birmingham Kitty Angels. I know Rizzla is genuinely adored and I have never had a problem with booking even at quite short notice,  can't say thanks enough!

Have just used Kitty Angels for the first time and think they provided an amazing service. We won't be nervous about leaving Caspar and Misty again thanks to Beverly and Kerry. It was fantastic to get an update and pictures after every visit. Thank you so much

Five stars isn't enough. Tony & Jason (owners), Bridget are professional, kind, and attentive. Not only did they do an amazing job taking care of our kitty Aza, but they kept us updated every day with lots of pictures attached. It made our holiday so much more relaxing to know that our Aza was happy and stayed at her home, not causing  a great deal of stress putting her in a cattery. We definitely recommend Kitty Angels and already planning to book next year! Thank you :)

I have used Kitty Angels twice now and my cats couldn't be in safer hands. Rachel visited us ahead of their first time and was really thorough - getting to know us, our cats and their routine to minimise stress to all parties whilst we were away. The second time one of our cats needed medication and this was all taken care of. They went the extra mile (and then some!) when said cat decided he didn't fancy taking his tablets after all. What I love most about Kitty Angels is that they send updates after each visit and plenty of photos of my cats playing, eating and having a cuddle so I can see they are safe and well. They also keep an eye on the house and are happy to do a few extra jobs such as putting the bins out, watering the plants and opening/closing the blinds. I highly recommend Kitty Angels.

We’ve used the Kitty Angels team for several years now and I wouldn’t use anyone else.  It’s great to have daily updates and pictures and it’s clear that the cats like their daily visitors!  They administer tablets when our elderly cat needs them and take time to play and fuss with them.  I also like the security of having someone visit the house each day.  Very highly recommended!

Great service - Kitty Angels have looked after Howard and now Frankie for a couple of years. It's reassuring to know that someone is going in daily to give them attention as well as feeding them. They seem to have genuinely good relationships with the cats and it's great to get the daily updates and photos. Although quite pricey, it's cheaper than a cattery and without the upset of being away from home for them. I would recommend.
Such a great service thanks!!

I have been using Kitty Angels in Birmingham City Centre for the last 18 months and from their first visit they exceeded my expectations! I get daily updates when they visit which reassures me that my furbaby is happy and getting some attention. Whenever I'm away for longer stays the flat is spotless when I return, the litter is changed and I'm greeted by a very happy puss! I couldn't recommend them enough.

Kitty angels have been looking after willow for about 3 years now, they clearly adore cats and provide us with fantastic updates on willow whilst we are away. They are reliable, hugely caring and most importantly willow adores all of the cat carers!

Angels by name, Angels by nature! I have used Kitty Angels for nearly two years now, and I cannot recommend them more! I have to go away often with work and it's so reassuring to know that the Angels will be there to take care of my two cats. I have them come twice a day and they not only do all the essential jobs like feeding, cleaning litter trays and replenishing their water bowls, they also spend a good amount of time each visit giving them love and attention and playing with them. They always send detailed updates with pictures and sometimes videos which is so lovely. It's so clear that everyone who works as a Kitty Angel truly loves and understands cats. They go above and beyond too- they will administer medication if needed and one time even caught and released a mouse my pesky cat had brought in alive! Truly fantastic service and always lovely to deal with too. My cats are always entirely happy and content when I return.

I have been using Kitty Angels (Birmingham) for a few years now - I usually go way at least a few times a year, sometimes for up to 3 weeks.  Last time I used them was in September and I have already booked them again for December.  I would recommend them to anyone!  Every time I go away it gives me so much peace of mind knowing my cats are safe and well looked after by the 'Angels'- which is constantly reinforced by the daily photos, videos and summary of their latest frolics they always send after each visit :) I am so glad I found Kitty Angels.  They have removed all the stress and worry from going away.

Kitty Angels are amazing . The care and attention that they give to our difficult little fur baby is just brilliant . The daily messages and pictures really do make a difference to your day as you know that they are been looked after by people who really care .

Kitty Angels are terrific. That’s really all you and your cat(s) need to know. Unlike a neighbour or friend who might agree to come in once or twice a day and dump some food in a bowl, KA get to know you and your cat(s) and they always go the extra mile to make sure cats and owners get platinum service. They are 100% reliable and make your cat’s welfare their top priority (including play and cuddles) as well making sure your home is safe and tidy. We found KA when we were in despair because no cattery would take our elderly blind cat, and now we come home to a sleek, happy, cheerful kitty. They are worth every penny.

Fantastic service, the angels are friendly and keep you well informed whilst away. Our cat seems a lot more settled than when he comes home from the Cattery. As well as fussing our cat, and sending us photos of him, they can also check on the house, bring post in, switch lights on/off, plus a whole range of other useful little tasks which give you peace of mind about your home whilst away.

I started using kitty angels after a recommendation made to me! I would never use anyone else, I feel comforted knowing my girls are able to stay in their home and get the best care! They are all so wonderful! Forever thank you!!

Found out about Kitty Angels through Facebook and was apprehensive but trusted the glowing reviews and so glad I did. Rachel and the Kings Heath team completely reassured me from the first consultation. I've never used catteries, and have always had friends to look after my cat, but the care Kitty Angels provide is unrivalled!

Puuurfect cat care with Kitty Angels! They genuinely care about my cats and I know they are in safe hands when I'm away and Kitty Angel's are visiting. They've taken the time to understand my cats' needs and adapt to suit their demands! I have an older lady cat and a semi-feral cat who is still adjusting to people and having a home. I know Kitty Angel's care, covering the necessities of cat care but also taking the time to play and fuss, and give my cats love and attention (when the cats are in the mood!). That's what I really respect about the Angels, they've taken time to understand my cats and what their individual needs and personalities are. Puuurfect!

I have used Kitty Angels on a number of occasions Have found them to be extremely reliable They even send photos of cats to reassure you that all is well while you’re away Thank you for taking such good care of my cats and going the extra mile to make sure they’re are cared for
I have never been disappointed with Pawshake & its sitters!

I used a pet sitter from Pawshake while I was recently away on holiday. I was really impressed with the care and attention given to my pets, it was obvious the sitter was a genuine animal lover. I would definitely recommend Pawshake, I will use them again when my next holiday comes around!

Got two pet sitters on pawshake so far, the experience was great with both of them. The app helped me find them, intermediated payment, allowed them to send me pictures... great in every sense. The app itself has a few bugs here and there but it seems to be constantly improving and the pricing beats the competitor because pawshake understands pet owners and how easy/hard it is to take care of pets (home visits to take care of 1 cat as opposed to two cats for example). I recommend Pawshake to all!
All worked perfectly, very pleased with the dog sitter we used, as was dog !
Organized, transparent, and easy to communicate with the dog-sitter. I am really happy with my experience with that app so far, and would definitely recommend others to give it a try.

We asked for daily visits for our cats, and our carer was amazing. She sent us pictures each day, cared for them fabulously, and checked on the mail too. It was such a relief to know that the pets were happy while we were away.

It was the first time for us to use this kind of service, so naturally we were a bit apprehensive. Well we couldn't have been happier, our animals were so well taken care of, our home was also treated with respect. Communication with Laura was easy and she kept us informed with pictures and messages often. We have already booked her again and will make use of Pawshake when ever required in the future.

We've had a wonderful experience using Pawshake. The site is easy to use and the sitters we have met over the years have been truly amazing! We are so happy with the service and the way the company looks to always improve.
Great experience from start to finish. Will be very happy to use again.

Easy to book and to communicate with your pet sitter. My husband and I were very impressed by the simple process, and with our sitter, who took great care of our cats, and was reliable and trustworthy.
Pawshake helped me find the best dog sitter! Thank you!

I have used pawshake on 2 separate occasions. One person was a teacher by profession,and he was very personable and did a great job taking our dog while on vacation,also used him for a few other times when I had some night shifts. I also recently hired a woman to come to our house to dog walk. She sent pictures and a highlighted map of the route they took.Impressive.
Very pleased. It was easy to arrange cat sitting and our sitter kept us informed with daily texts whilst we were away.

The app is really easy to use - payments go through no problems and the sitters profiles and reviews are very accurate. I've been really happy with Pawshake's committment to customer service and their insurance is a plus. Wouldn't hesitate to recommend it if you're looking for pet sitters.
Pawshake had been great and we found a good fit for a pet sitter.
I've had nothing but great experiences using Pawshake - I've used it about 5 times now.

I found my pet sitter very easily on the app, so we made arrangements to meet, the meet went well and we booked our pet sitter that week. Our pet sitter Marta was absolutely fabulous with our 2 fur babies I couldn’t recommend her highly enough

Very happy with my first Pawshake experience.  The sitter stayed in my home for a week with my senior dog. I got daily photos updates. His medication was administered. He was happy and relaxed on my return. Sitter was very pleasant and easy to deal with and was respectful of my home as well as my dog. Would highly recommend.
I have been using Pawshake for over a year now and I have always found excellent pet sitters, trustworthy and professional. Highly recommended

Pawshake was easy to use and the pet sitter was friendly, professional and put us at ease.  We got photos and text messages each day which put our minds to ease about our pets.  Good value for money especially considering the peace of mind!
Excellent site
Good site, and appreciated the response for assistance, as I learn the various pages on the Nomador site.
Nomador is a great service for Homeowners and Homesitters.   I strongly recommend it

easy to use and I don't get bombarded with emails.
Excellent site, primarily focused on the French-speaking part of the world, but also has a lot of listings for housesits around Europe and internationally.
Brillant concept, I would recommend to anyone.
The badge system for rating people seems like a child's game. It would be better to leave a straightforward review similar to the type one leaves on air b&b.
Sometimes you have to wait a long time before you get an answer and then it is said that they found someone else already. However, it is generally a good way to get addresses all over France.

This is an excellent site for those seeking House sits, especially in Europe. Although the vetting is less than other sites, the opportunities are abundant and diverse. I highly recommend becoming a member of Nomador.
I have used Nomador several times and it has always been wonderful!

Excellent cat sitting experiences - used Nomador twice , two different cat sitters, both great. Respectful, cat lover and trustworthy. I strongly recommend Nomador

I`m so happy I found this platform. Couse I love both: travelling and I`m an absolute pet lover. I can only report positive which makes other doubting germans astonished cause it`s not common in my country.
I love using Nomador. The website is easy to use, it's very safe and the Nomador team is very helpful.
Great website, easy to use, the opportunities are diverse and home owners are serious and friendly...

We were very successful to find housesits in France with Nomador. Good platform on which you can put lots of info about yourself. The reference section is well set up. we can easily find the housesits that would suit us and the applying has been fast. We have noticed that Nomador is excellent for France and Switzerland (and possibly other European countries, but no first hand experience) but has little assignments outside of Europe. The price is fair.
Have only used once, but had a very successful cat sit in Athens. A great international service.

Jen was a wonderful cat sitter while we were out of town. She was very conscious of our needs, and sent us great photos of our shy babies coming out to meet her. I would highly recommend her for your babies too.

My cat sitter from Meowtel got in touch right away and was very reliable. He let me know what times he would be visiting, and would send messages and pictures so I didn't have to worry about a thing. Would 100% recommend!

The website is easy to navigate. I was able to find a sitter right away, and within days we were making arrangements for a meet and greet. The process was seamless. I will absolutely use Meowtel in the future.
I'm very satisfied.
Cats were very happy. Thank you!

Rudy from Meowtel was fantastic. My usual petsitter had a last minute conflict, and I was able to easily book and contact Rudy through the website. My kitty is very shy, but he did a great job making her feel comfortable and well-cared for. He sent messages and pix daily so I didn't need to worry about a thing. Great Petsitter and kept me updated!
Good experience. Would use again.

Rosemary was incredibly reliable, knowledgable and made us super comfortable while we were across the world! She sent us pictures and videos along with updates. I can't thank her enough for watching our fur babies. I will absolutely refer Rosemary and Meowtel to friends. Hands down the best experience we could ask for.
John was very dependable, caring and reliable. Thank you to John and Meowtel for making our vacation a peaceful experience!

This was my first Cat sitter experience. I was very impressed. Erica was so good! Really accommodating. Went the extra mile. My Siamese cat really soaked up her attention. Erica sent us photos of her visit. 🥰😊🙌
Great service!

Shona is a wonderful sitter who spoils your kitty with new toys, grooming sessions and funny photo updates that ease the worry of leaving your pet.  Meowtel is a professional, easy to use service that I hope to use everytime I travel. My cat is calm and relaxed when I get home unlike boarding at the vets! Great service.
Very communicative, we felt safe leaving our kitty (who needs a pill everyday) in her hands.
look forward to ordering  again.........
They had the best price on these small heart tag protectors so I ordered 20 of them.  Very fast shipping.  I will not hesitate to purchase from ArcataPet.com again.

I was very disappointed with the quality of the cups. The web site said the manufacturer was "Planit Engineering" which I received on previous orders. The cups I received are not made by Planit Engineering and are a soft cheep plastic that my parrots can chew and destroy in a matter of days.

My order was shipped very quickly, and well packaged.  I had no problems with the site.  All the items I had been looking for were found in this store.  Thank you for such fine service.  I will be back for more toys after my cockatoo finishes with these.

The transaction itself was efficient and quick delivery but the product sadly didn't state correct sizing. I bought an opti-visor for my chihuahua - she had eye surgery and will be vision impaired after. I thought it would be something wonderful to protect her eyes if she walked into something but sadly, even following the sizing specifications it does not fit her. Because I put it together (of course to see if it fit) my understanding is it cannot be returned.
Birds and I love the new bowls!  Everything arrived as ordered.  In fact, ordered more bowls as they work so well in all the bird cages?  Thank you!
i love it. My bird loves it too.
I love Arcata Pet. Great variety of products and super fast readonable international shipping. Highly recommended!

Great selection, fast shipping and high quality products! Everything I get for my dog, she loves it!! And she's a picky eater. I highly recommend this website for all who want the best for their best friends :)
The item was just as described and shipping was very fast. It definitely put a smile on my husbands face!! Thank you

It was a big job as we had custom painted walls and marble base.  He was able to cut though about 10 inches of solid concrete wall, then installed the hale pet door. Installed Hale Omni Panel Pet Door in a sliding glass door frame. They were very helpful on the phone; printed/web documentation had unclear text with near-useless photos/diagrams. I suspect we'll need lots of low-expansion aerosol foam to get an acceptable thermal seal around the insert.I Expected better from Hale. But, our Dobie charged right through the double flap dog door and is a happy camper. We're satisfied.

After about 8-9 years, my outside door flap started to crack, so I bought the replacement flap kit.  I am not at all handy, but it was very easy to do. My original door was totally great, easy for my dog to use, and very weather proof.  the replacement looks every bit as good.  You can also securely close the inside door at night or when you are out of town, with a heavy duty plastic insert that locks into place.  Hale is a really good company, and they make a really good product.

We've had two different pet doors in other houses before.  We built a new house and put in a Hale door.  What a difference!  The dogs took right to I, but the 40+ mph windstorm we had didn't budge it. It's by far better than any pet door we have ever had.  Love It!

I have a very active 3 year old 80 pound Jindo.  After researching various screen pet doors on Amazon, one reviewer mentioned that Hale was the best.  That led me to the Hale website and although the Hale doors were more expensive, they looked a lot sturdier to me than what was offered on Amazon.  I decided to buy and install it myself, which was very straight forward with the supplied instructions. Well, after 6 months, the Hale door is worth every penny.  It's not only sturdy, but looks great.   Our Jindo loves the freedom of coming and going at will.  It only took a a day or two for him to get confident going through the swing door.  The magnetic sides really keep the bugs out of the house - its so much better than opening and shutting the door all the time.  I strongly recommend this product.  Also, if your dog is a rescue pet, like our Jindo, they will give you a 10% discount and donate to the rescue of your choice.  That's legit.  It was a pleasure purchasing form Hale and will do so again if I ever need to replace my screen pet door (which I may never need to!)

I have had this door for 13 years, with 4 large dogs and it has held up great. The double flaps really keep the heat and cold out. Just this year the flaps finally started tear. I ordered the replacement kit and now it is as good as new.

The in-wall dog door is high quality, certainly better than the lower cost one I had to replace  A little more investment upfront is worth being able to order replacement parts in the future.  The instructions were very detailed making installation relatively easy.

I needed an abnormally tall yet slim dog door for my screen to accommodation my greyhounds. I looked the product up online, made one call and within a week or so had the perfect door for my dogs. the door fits well in the screen, looks great and I couldn't be happier with the overall experience.
No drafts hot or cold.

Without the use of my Dremel and cutting discs to either cut the screws or create a good slot in the head for a flat blade screw driver, I would have been in serious trouble.  Anyway, after an hour or so of sweating and swearing, all is well. I hope for another 10 or 15 years of service from this door.

I am a Pet Food Nutrition Specialist and if you cannot make your own raw food for your pets, Darwin's is one of the nutritionally best foods I have found. I wish the main ingredients provided adequate vitamins and minerals so synthetic versions did not need to be added. I have a picky kitty that won't eat the food occasionally. I have found that when this happens, the food has a sweeter smell than normal.  Occasionally, the beef or lamb dog food is not ground up as much as the other varieties and my dog doesn't like the lumpy texture. Switching from a kibble & canned kitty food diet to Darwin's has naturally treated pododermatitis (an autoimmune disease) for one of our kitties.  The other kitty is softer, no longer has gunk in the inner corners of his eyes, and is so much more active!
Great service, great quality.

My German Shepherd was unable to digest any food off the shelf.  Trainers and breeders recommended raw food with raw chicken or turkey necks. A friend recommended Darwins several years ago, and here we are.  It includes the vegetables I used to blend for him as well as the high quality meats.  Cairo has flourished with Darwins.  He's nearly 8 and still has the energy of puppy.  I wouldn't change a thing; great quality, delivered on time, and super customer service with wonderful people.  What's not to like?

Great food for my cat!  My cat suffered from chronic diarrhea for over 18 months while my vet tried every test possible they could not figure out how to treat him.  We tried numerous different prescription diet foods, none that helped him.  Finally we found that a daily steroid pill was the only thing that helped his diarrhea. I was not comfortable giving him a daily steroid pill (which causes negative side effects) and so I finally tried Darwin's raw pet food. I stopped giving him the pill the same day I gave him the raw food.  His diarrhea went away IMMEDIATELY!  He is now healthy and has gained weight and no longer has to take the doctor prescribed pills. I could not be happier with this cat food.
My dogs love the food. It always arrives on time. I like that the boxes are sent back and re-used. I do think that the meat to veg ratio is a little low.

I'm happy to find a company who makes toys for little dogs. Finding them are practically impossible. I know more people with small dogs, than those with larger dogs, who state the same complaints. Most toys are too big, bulky or heavy for a small dog to get a good grip on or carry.  The squeakers in the toys are located too far from the material edge, making it hard for a small dogs mouth to get to it. The most common questioning voice from people I know with small dogs is, why doesn't some company do a little research and make dog toys for small breeds? My dog is a 10 yr old, 12# Shih Tzu, toys galore, majority untouched. Her best and favorite? You know those dog faced head, long eared,  long bodied dog toys? This one has a much thinner body than those today. It's red, has squeaker in head and mid body, material very close knitted loop like thread. I've sewed it's ears on countless times, I've sewn up holes all over it's head, one eye is gone, mid body squeaker gone, but the one in head works and she can get her mouth on it to make it squeak. She's had it since she was 6 months old. The honest truth--there can be a pile of 10 toys on floor and she roots and gets this, because she can grasp in her mouth, anywhere. Hopefully you continue to offer small dog toys. I certainly will point my friends with small dogs in your direction. Thank you for your time, T Alsup

Because the fish was still in quarantine they had to change my shipping day to the friday instead of the thursday which was fine. I emailed back and gave them my personal address instead of my office where they were being shipped and had no response so I emailed again the next day to ask if they had got the message to which they replied that yes it had been sent to the new address. you can imagine my confusion when the package went to the old address and because I didnt receive a tracking number I was completely unaware until hours ages after arriving when one of my staff rang to question why there was a box at my office I hadnt collected, as it turns out they had changed the address but left the giant bold note under the address stating my offices name/address and that it was going to my office, the whole point of changing the address was that I wouldnt have to walk my pregnant butt 20min into town to carry a box of fish back home

I am so pleased that we decided to upgrade to a professionally installed system. Our old system was over 10 years old and very unreliable. For that reason, I never trained our younger dog. The dog watch system definitely had more features that I had not expected.Mary Ann installed the fence in less than a week. After explaining how to use the system, she stayed and worked with our dogs. She predicted they would be easy to train and she was right! She gave me a two week instruction sheet and in two weeks my dogs were fully trained . I never had any issues but I know she will gladly help if I needed to contact her.

Chris was prompt and on time for the estimate, communication was great.  Got back to us with the bid and answered questions we had thought of. Install day, was there on time and was very quick and professional.  Worked with us and the dogs to learn the fence and how it worked. 30 Days later we can let out dogs out with us and they know their boundaries...they stay in the yard!  So far so good!
Everything went exactly as it should and yhat really saying something these days...

Great people to deal with very responsive and genuinely care about make sure your dog gets trained. They really put the effort in to help train the dogs and are always following up to make sure things are going well. Highly recommend!

I needed a reliable indoor fence to keep my dog from going downstairs to the basement .  In the past I had bought one from on line but they were not reliable and could shock the dog when they were not near the location.  The fence by dog watch is exactly what i needed.  It never shocks unless he enters the zone, it gives him fair warning if he is getting close and I can control the amount shock he receives.  It is a great product and I would highly recommend this. Also, it gives us options on how we want to form the barrier which is helpful depending on the area you need to keep them out of.
System works great. No issues yet. Joel was very good and helped me even though I had a tricky back yard

We used to keep our lab on a zipline leash because he would roam off unlike our other labs. I was reluctant to get an invisible fence because I was concerned our lab would run through it chasing an animal in our yard. But he doesn't even come close to the fence and always stays in our yard! Our lab also used to chase cars, bikers & get into our trash but since he received his very first shock by the road during his training, our lab never goes close to that area.  We can set the trash out the night before and we don't have to worry that he's going to get into it now.  It has made our lives less stressful and more simple.Dog Watch was excellent to work with. They were happy to answer all my questions and knew how to train our dog. He was completely trained within two weeks. I highly recommend Dog Watch Hidden Fence.  :-)

My dog ran away recently. He digged right under the fence. When I realized he wasnt home it was dark out and so circled my neighborhood and surrounding areas over and over again with no luck. Just when I was about to give up I remembered he had the chip and went & checked my email. sure enough I had an email from petlink indicating where he was and the name of the individual at the facility. I was overwhelmed with joy and was so relieved. Thanks to this I’m confident that if I ever go through this misfortune again I will be able to be easily reunited with my pet.

After a year of being a customer, very disappointed in last contact. It was time to refill my prescription for Apoquel, and I saw that their price had risen substantially. I looked around, and found other companies had not raised their price. So I called them, hoping they would at least match their previous prices (I wasn't even asking for them to match the other companies, whose price was lower than their previous price; I wanted to try to stay loyal to them). I received a reply letting me know that they could not lower their price, it was out of their hands due to the company that made the drug. I wrote again, hoping they would make an adjustment since I had been a loyal customer. They told me they could give me a "one-time" code to lower the price to their previous price. They were less than friendly. That meant I would be paying the higher price in the future. And the code they gave me didn't even work. That's when I told them I would be writing online reviews about my disappointment with them. Only THEN did they change their tune, and a representative called me to see if they could make things right. Too late. I contacted Allivet. They guarantee lowest prices. Not only was their price substantially lower than Vet Approved RX, their service was exceptional - I received my purchase very quickly. I recommend Allivet.

I'm a long time customer and have always received EXCELLENT customer service from US based staff who actually WANT to  provide positive customer service. And the prices are very fair, with fast shipping. I've referred many other customers to VET APPROVED RX  because of the excellent service I always receive. Danmarks bedste akvariebutik! Ole er altid smilende og imødekommende, uanset om man kommer for at handle eller bare har ungerne med ude og kigge fisk. Der er altid kaffe på kanden og tid til en sludder. Derudover vil jeg vove den påstand at det også er Danmark reneste akvariebutik - hvilket kun gør det mere trygt at købe levende dyr af Ole Kæmpe Thumbs Up herfra!
Min foretrukne akvariebutik. Altid et bredt og spændende udvalg til rimelige priser og uovertruffen service.

Top professionelle og altid god service. Altid mod til at have lidt mere specielle fisk mv end traditionelle forhandlere. Har handlet der flere gange og aldrig set døde fisk i akvarierne. Har dog oplevet en enkelt gang at en fisk er død kort tid efter hjemkomst, men den blev bare erstattet ved næste besøg.
Unimati er en rigtig god og virkelig hyggelig butik hvor man kan få alt hvad hjertet begær hvad angår akvarie udstyr og fisk. Deres fisk er af bedste kvalitet
Spændende og inspirerende butik og yderst kompetent vejledning. Der bliver taget god tid til hver enkel kunde.
God og pålidelig vejledning og tilmed fair priser. Kan varmt anbefales.

Service, rådgivning, udvalg og humøret har været helt i top hver gang vi på det seneste har besøgt forretningen. I received some really terrible news after routine blood work of my young pup. It turns out after many additional blood tests costly specialist exam fees and even an ultrasound, he was diagnosed with renal dysplasia. This was incredibly devastating news especially to hear in such a young pup, my first ever actually, a real sweet rescue boy. Figo quickly reimbursed the difference for my policy and I am so glad I have them as a partner moving forward in trying to support my dogs congenital condition. It was so emotional and devastating finding out this news, that I can't explain how much this was lessened when Figo quickly covered the expenses. I'm hoping to give my pup the best life moving forward, and after experiencing this in such a young dog, I can't say how important it is for everyone to consider getting insurance. I won't have to choose between the best care and cost and I am so grateful.

Figo is the best pet insurance company out there. In terms of customer service, policy, ease of app/website, and a straight forward & fast claim process. They have competitive prices and offer a 100% reimbursement option! If you got this policy for a pet before issues start, you will have no regrets. If you got it after issues started, and if requested, they will thoroughly review your pets history and clearly let you know what won’t be covered going forward. If something comes up with one of my pets, I know Figo has got my back.

Our dog has just been diagnosed with diabetes. The team at Figo has been very helpful, advising and leading us through the procedures for reimbursement. Excellent!!

I was on the fence about getting health insurance for my rescue dog. She was relatively old when I adopted her, and I worried this factor would inflate her deductible and monthly premiums. I was also concerned about the ease of submitting claims, as I have an extremely demanding work schedule, and I don't have time to continually request forwarded veterinary records and justifications for services. I took the plunge via Figo after reading positive reviews, and I am so thankful that I found them! My dog was diagnosed with a hip injury a few months into our policy, and Figo has covered virtually every vet bill with no hassle. thanks to this insurance, we will be able to provide our dog with the care she deserves. I love Figo so much that I purchased a year of coverage for my friend's cat as a birthday present (for the friend, not the cat, she got a new feather toy).

I used FIgo for three months but recently cancelled them for another insurer. I'm giving them two stars because their customer service is good and we always received prompt responses. My issue with them is pricing and the structure of their insurance. They charge a higher monthly premium than other insurers. They charge the co-pay prior to applying the deductible, which, frankly, is ridiculous. It makes no sense that they should be reducing your out-of-pocket expense by the co-pay before applying it to your deductible. Lastly, they don't cover the cost of vet fees. I'm honestly surprised they have as many customers as they do with a structure like this. I switched to another insurance company which will save me $20/mo, covers the cost of vet fees, and applies expenses to the deductible before co-pay. No brainer.

Figo insurance is hands down one of the best companies I have ever had to work with.  I have used this insurance for almost 3 years and 2 dogs. Payment direct deposited into my account 48 hours later.  Fantastic customer service, fantastic coverage and peace of mind for puppy owners!

My dogs stayed with a Rover dog sitter for four days earlier this month. Our Rover sitter had her own dogs there and other dogs she was watching. All this was totally fine as  we have had this sitter in the past and she handles multiple dogs great! When I picked them up on 9/14, they came home and developed diarrhea. Our golden retriever had it the worst !   To the extent, we put up baby gates in the kitchen (the golden is 9 years old so these baby gates are not used often!) because we had poop everywhere. We took her to the vet. Our vet informed me she was infected with a parasite. The vet said it came from a dish, water bowl, the yard or another dog.  Our shetland sheepdog then started showing signs of the parasite about a day later. Luckily he didnt have it as bad as he is 13 years old.. We cared for him, giving him a bland diet. Within three days he got worse and we took him to the emergency vet. It took about two weeks for the dogs to look and play like normal. This was extremely stressful after coming back from vacation.   We love our dogs - they are part of our family and we will do anything for them. But the bills added up quickly to keep them healthy. Vet: $366.00 9 Cans of Rug Cleaner - $45 (nothing worked either... wil need to replace) I submitted this issue to Rover and asked that other people that are taking their dogs to this house be told about tthe parasite. How many other dogs are getting sick? I also asked to be reimbursed for the dog’s stay or to be paid for the vet bills as this was obviously contacted at the sitter’s house. Rover.com refused to help with anything. They said NO - No infections are covered . REALLY ?   They have no liability. i ask myself.. what is covered   ???? Is this somewhere I want to take my dogs again? No. How can i ever be sure that there is not an issue at another person’s house? Wasn’t the luxury of using Rover.com so you didnt have to put your dogs in a kennel and they could be comfortable while you are away? Rover.com doesnt stand by their own business plan as they are not monitoring or reviewing any sort of “condition”  their pet sitter’s houses are in. I have used Rover for YEARS. I will never use Rover again. I am just thankful that the unkept house didn't kill my dogs.
The people on the site are great.  The website is frustrating cause we gave up writing a review cause it kept disappearing, only the stars came thru.
Great service
Was a bit hesitant to have people come into our home but after first visit, we were at ease     Our sitter sent us pics of their walks and locked up just as asked!

I was able to meet up a few times before we had to leave him and we kept in touch throughout our trip. .. I will definitely use my sitter again and you do not need to worry if it is the first time you need to leave your pooch as you play a big part in making sure they get a good deal and get on with their sitter. .

We have been DogWatch customers for 10+ years and recommend them wholeheartedly. Each time we place a call, Drew is out for a fix the next day (if not the day of the call) and we are up and running again in no time. Training our dogs was a snap (the border collie saw the Jack Russel take a corrective shock, and needed no further instruction!), too. If an electric dog fence is right for you, based on our experience, DogWatch of Colorado is the way to go!  Truly great product & service.

I got a 30 day free certificate for pet insurance.  First, they denied my claim.  Even though it took the process over 14 days from the day I submitted it.   I think it was worthless to have a 30-day free pet insurance especially I was denied.   I think they are super expensive.  They charge over $100/month for two dogs just for accident and illness.  I pay $60/month for two dogs from somewhere else.   Then they have a pet wellness plan offered but it's only an additional cost on top of the accidental and illness plan.  It would nice if they offered the pet wellness plan as a separate plan.  I thought this insurance being part of the AKC...it would be affordable and worth it.  But when you get denied and its expensive....at the end it's not worth it.  I think you're paying the name "AKC"   I definitely would NOT recommend this insurance company!

The insurance plan I have is supposed to cover heart worm prevention and flea and tick prevention. I do not buy through my vet because it is less expensive to go through Chewy's or 1-800-Pet med. Visits I have made to my Vet that have been faxed into the insurance company have been reimbursed at the shared rate.

I pay additional money every month for their add-ons such as ExamPlus and AlternativePlus but that didn't help me to get reimbursement for my claims.

comment: We ordered the e-collar 1900S. It's taken 3 days of me keeping on eye on our German Shepherd. He was always running out on to the street or running to the neighbor's, but this collar has saved us so much $. Instead of buying an electric dog fence, this collar has broken him of this. He used to run out on the street and viciously bark at neighbors and dogs walking by, but not anymore after buying this amazing collar. I am impressed. I like that there are minimum settings. He responds well to just the minimum.
The first unit I purchased malfunctioned (wouldn't charge) and I had to return it to Cabelas for a replacement (which works fine).

The e collar we have from Dogtra coupled with an excellent trainer who taught how to correctly use it has made a dramatic difference for our dog. He now can walk with us off leash and obeys when we tell him come and stay with us.  He is a happier dog and enjoying life more and we love we can give him the freedom he deserves.

Ordered medicine (Atopica for cats) Sunday evening. Status of the order is "Waiting for approval" all day Monday. Tuesday morning, I tried to call PetVM - call is going straight to voicemail. Left a message, and called my vet - sure enough, they have no requests for approval. It took multiple attempts to reach PetVM on the phone or via email, finally a person with Indian accent (denying calling from India) got on a conference call with my vet and myself, asking for verbal approval. After he was given the approval, started asking questions about instructions for the medicine (!), ignoring my attempts to explain that we're using the medicine for a long time. This is when I finally lost it - needless to say, my advice will be to steer clear. EDIT: Shortly after my initial negative 1-star review was posted (apparently, businesses get automatically notified of the feedback on this site), I was contacted by a nice woman from PetVM (Montana), who apologized for the delays and the negative experience I had, and shipped the medicine right away. Obviously, this is the outcome I was looking for, it's just too bad it had to come to this to achieve it. The resulting 3* rating is a combination of my initial experience, and satisfactory resolution.

PVM has EXCELLENT customer service!  They are prompt and on top of things.  They contact you before you need to contact them, if there is any issue.  It was so refreshing to discover the very rare quality of 'serving a customer'!  Thank you PVM!

I ordered and paid for a drug, all veterinarian info given and after 2 weeks I called to follow up on my order, they claimed that no response from the vet. I had to call the clinic and they confirmed that they sent the info, they even asked to call the clinic directly to get verbal approval. I called the pet value mart and told them that. 3 weeks passed and nothing, now they are not answering my phone calls. a TOTAL SCAM, so be careful

I found Petvaluemart online when I was looking for another cost option for my dogs Rx for Apoquel. I refuse to buy it at the vets office. Mark up there is ridiculous. Her medication is very expensive no matter where it is purchased, but recently found it at another company for less per pill, which is how it's purchased. I've used this popular website company in the past and have no issues with them, but would rather stick with petvaluemart as I am very pleased with their customer service, quick filling of your Rx and quality of product. I decided to ask customer service if they price match and to my delight they do! I was refunded immediately the difference of the cost of my on going order. I am very pleased with this company and their email correspondence is almost immediate. I have been a customer for 1 year now. Oh, also 1 big perk..free shipping on whatever you order. No maximum order of $49+ Such a blessing! Turn around time is usually about 3 days as they are located in CA. I would recommend you give them a try.

BEWARE; these five star reviews are fake. This is a front for an Indian company selling counterfeit products. There is no one at the address on the website. They ask for your birthdate when you order (?), and call you looking for drivers license numbers. Just stay far away.
good  excellent

The order was 100% complete, 100% correct and I saved substantial dollars over other pharmacies and my vet's office!  I am one happy customer and will gladly recommend them to others. I trusted this company with my dog's health, and I think I got scammed.    I thought I was getting a great deal when I discovered my dog's arthritis medicine in a 3-month supply for quite a bit less per pill than I usually get it.  I'm not sure what the problem is, but AS SOON as she made the switch to the new Petvaluemart meds, she was in pain and limping and has continued to be ever since.  I tried to contact them to ask to return the remaining pills (over $100 worth!!) for a refund, but they never responded.   I am VERY upset and intend to complain to everyone I can in the hopes that I will get a response.

Five days after ordering the medication still had not shipped. Their phone number goes straight to voice mail. When someone returned my phone call it was with a very heavy Indian accent (I couldn't understand the message). If you check on Google maps you will discover that their address is a very small building behind a rental office. This appears to be a one or two man operation. They may have been okay in the past but there are clearly numerous problems now in May, 2018.

STAY AWAY!  This company is fake, they charge your credit card and then never send you your medicine, not honor upgraded shipping methods, will claim to have tried to contact you but fail to deliver proof, says they will call you back and then wont, call center DOES NOT SPEAK ENGLISH, wont issue refund, says supervisor "isn't there", doesn't care that your dog is DYING, hung up on me (refusal of service), failed to mention that the phone call was being recorded (and then threatened me with it later), called me unprofessional (I don't need to be professional, I'm not the one running a business).  Reporting to BBB, going to write bad reviews everywhere, and I reported them to the Drug Enforcement Agency.  If my dog dies because of them, I will be pursing them legally.

This site asks for your Date Of Birth. Not your pet's DOB, YOUR DOB. What's up with that? HELLO Petvaluemart, you do not need to know somebody's DOB to do business with them. Get real. I went somewhere else with my business.

We were passing through town and needed a place for our two dogs for the day so we could take in the sights. The whole process was great.

I've been using Walkio during vacations and for extra walks for our golden retriever.  It's really easy to book a sitter - I can even do it the same day, and I love getting texts when they've visited.  The sitters often send pics of my pup, he always looks so happy. The only thing I would request is booking similar to the way you book a hotel (start date and end date). Not having to input each visit would save a lot of time booking. Otherwise great experience. Thanks

I gave Aquatic Warehouse 5 stars because they actually read my notes in my order. I asked to please not send me this filter if it is not the most up to date filter. I purchased the FX6 canister filter from Petco off of Ebay and they didn't send me the one that was pictured on the website. When I received it, it was the wrong one. They refused to exchange it. So I just returned it. Thanks to Aquatic Warehouse I received the most up to date FX6 filter and paid $22 less for it. Aquatic Warehouse was quick to respond to me via email and a phone call from Pat assuring me that the FX6 canister filter will be the most up to date filter available. I received my filter within a week of my order. I was able to set up my 300 gallon turtles tank July 1, 2018 with my FX6 Canister Filter. So far I love they way it is working. Thank you Aquatic Warehouse and Pat for being so prompt with your service. I will definitely recommend shopping on your website to anyone.
