If there were more than 5 stars, Ruidoso Malinois would get them! I am beyond pleased with my decision to purchase a trained dog from Ruidoso Malinois. And my dog—beyond my wildest expectations! He is wonderful, fulfilling his role as protector with absolute confidence, and is incredibly smart. He is a loyal companion and I have not had one moment of regret.

Before I begin my review of Ruidoso Malinois, I think it appropriate to  provide a brief description of myself. I am a 62 year old whom is OCD about my dogs. I am a former police K9 Handler and been exposed to hundreds of police dogs from all over the country. I have attended several formal dog training programs and I am very focused and particular when I select a dog. Before I ended my search for a Malinois puppy, I traveled the country, via automobile, and visited several popular Malinois breeders. Prior to reaching Ruidoso Malinois, I contacted several law-enforcement agencies in the area and completed a brief background investigation of the establishment and its owner. I discovered that both are respected members of the community. After I arrived at Ruidoso Malinois, the owner Irene provided me a tour of the facility. I immediately noticed the approximately 70 dogs/puppies were housed in clean extremely organized kennels. I also observed several older “retired” dogs on the property that were inside a large dog run. Irene told me that the older dogs are living the rest of their lives in luxury. Irene also pointed to an older dog whose breed I cannot remember, that was allowed to run around another large dog run. I do not remember the specifics of the story, but Irene said she adopted the dog and was taking care of it at great expense. It soon became evident Irene is not only a dog breeder, she has compassion for the animals as well. During several lengthy conversations, Irene displayed vast knowledge about Malinois and their care. Everything I observed was far and above things I observed at other kennels I visited. I drove home with a 16 week old Ruidoso Malinois puppy. A few weeks ago after a blood test administered to the puppy indicated health concerns, I contact Irene and she was very responsive and helpful. She told me that she would have her veterinarian examine the test results and get back to me. The following day I took the puppy to a different veterinarian and had another blood sample withdrawn. Thankfully, the results of the second blood test revealed a healthy puppy. Often time when I am observed working my pup, people ask where I got him. My pup recently turned 12 months old and he is smart, balanced and possesses all drives necessary to be a great working dog. I am the weak link in the partnership. I think highly of Irene and the dogs that are produced at her facility.

The rating is for Ruidoso Malinois where I have purchased three Malinois over the course of 9 years. I will discuss my experiences via a separate review. However, the following is directed @Truthseeker882 (TS) whose comments about heartworm are baseless. TS apparently does not know much about canine epidemiology, in particular that regarding heartworm, and how to look up, review and understand the heartworm prevalence map of the US. With respect to where I live in Mohave County AZ and the location of Ruidoso Malinois in Lincoln County NM, the incidence rate for heartworm is 0.2% (3 cases in 2019) and 0% (0 cases in 2019) respectively. Since the parasite is transmitted by mosquitoes and is more prevalent in wetter environments, it's statistically reasonable, per the aforementioned map, to state that if you purchased a puppy from Ruidoso Malinois and at an annual wellness check, months after receipt of the puppy, a heartworm infection is detected, don't imply blame to Ruidoso Malinois but check where you live. Also, note in the Ruidoso Malinois purchase agreement there is a specific recommendation to have a wellness check within 30 days of purchase. Therefore, TS, it's one thing to reasonably discuss a potential concern but quite another to spread false information/implications about someone's character and business.
Your dog may come with heart worms because Irene doesn't believe mosquitos are in New Mexico and you will be out upwards of 16k

Got my puppy a few days ago! He came via American Airlines , he came in a brand new cage that was mine to keep. He was sent with his food and water accessible to him in the cage. He was hyper out of the cage as any pup would be after 2 flights (connecting to Pittsburgh)! We immediately bonded per Irene’s recommendations on our greeting. We’ve bonded approximately 3 days now and he follows me everywhere , doesn’t even need a leash (He hates his leash anyway haha). I must say Irene picked the perfect puppy as a K9 candidate for me and my department. His personality is perfect for an amazing working dog. You can tell she cares about the pups because of his amazing confidence, grooming , and general health upon further observation the last few days. I would highly recommend Irene and company to anyone looking for a good puppy. I can’t speak on the training from experience , but if she runs her training anything like the puppies, I’d trust it! I remember reading several people having issues, but the issues were things that to me appeared people lacked patience. I blew Irene up all the time she probably wanted to throw her phone! Haha, but she didn’t , she responded to me in a timely manner , never blew me off , and just kept me up to date with pictures, information on his well being , and knowledge of how to prepare for him. I hope that Gideon can be a standard and a demonstration for others in my area as a place to take there business when it comes to getting Police K9s, because hands down I couldn’t have asked for a better experience. Irene your a cut above the rest. Thank you again

One week ago we got our Second Malinois from Irene. After having our first Ruidoso Malinois for two years and continuing a relationship which started three months before getting him, we trusted Irene to pick out our puppy. We knew she would get us our perfect puppy and she did!!  Another beautiful, solid temperament and smart as a whip Malinois! We are having so much fun with her and look forward to training in obedience, nose work, bite work and agility. These dogs can do it all! Ruidoso Malinois is an impressive working Malinois kennel. If you are looking for a dog with superior breeding you will find it at Ruidoso Malinois. Thank you Irene!

Met Irene 4 yrs ago when I decided to buy a mal puppy.She picked out pup for me and I went to New mexico to pick her up.Very nice lady she told me the do's and don't s with a new pup.Never imaged how loyal the pup was She went every where with me .About 3 months ago w lost Ida . We were heart broken. Called Irene and she remembered me and Ida. Told her what happened with Ida .She was heartbroken too.Told Irene we needed another pup.She picked out another pup for us and we picked her up on June 1 2019. If you are wanting a top of the line pup or fully trained dog I would call Irene. She knows her dogs and she gets to know who is buying dog.This is the second pup w have bought from her and I would not hesitate to buy another dog from Irene. Thanks again for wonderful pup Irene.

We are among those Belgian Shepard dog owners who think Irene chooses the right dog for each perspective owner. While we haven't met Irene in person yet, she has been helpful considering her very busy schedule. And she has staff members who are knowledgeable and helpful. Thank you, Irene and staff. There is one thing that we didn't expect -- our Malinois pup apparently carries recessive genes that have resulted in a Belgian Shepard with long, relatively thin hair. Also, much of his coat is darkening to sable or black, but his hindquarters remain fawn. No one we have met so far thinks he is Malinois, which can be irritating. Appearance aside, the dog we bought from Ruidoso Malinois is intelligent, protective, curious and he learns commands easily. Again, thank you, Irene. Oh, another aside, when we went to pick up our puppy, the all of the outdoor puppy pens were spotless and there were no flies or other insects to be found. Caring for so many animals is hard, sometimes thankless work and so another thank you. Best, Robert C Brown and Barbara Staley Brown

We purchased a 2-year-old female dog from Ruidoso almost three months ago, and we could not be more thrilled with our new life.  Our family of four traveled to New Mexico and were trained on property, two sessions per day for our five-day handlers training. Many different options for skills were presented.  We were able to discuss and select the skills important to our family, and she was trained for around 10 weeks on only those commands we agreed upon.  That is the business side of things. It has been surprising to me how attached our family has gotten to our dog.  She has brought our family a ton of joy, as well as security.  She is wicked smart – I swear she has telepathy. That being said, Ruidoso Malinois not only perfectly found the right dog for our circumstance, but they also delivered upon their promise to train and provide an extremely well-trained dog. Irene and her staff truly love the breed.  They made us feel safe and welcome, considering the stress of training to handle and maintain a protective canine. We have owned many different breeds of dogs – English Mastiff, Labrador, Weimaraner, Beagle, Pug, and Dachshaund.  There are only two things to say about Ruidoso Malinois.  I will never purchase any other breed of dog other than a Belgium Malinois.  I will never purchase another Belgium Malinois from anyone but the best . . . and the best is Ruidoso. Our family gives Ruidoso a ten out of ten stars.

Our entire experience, from meeting Irene Howcroft, visiting her Ruidoso Malinois kennel, and purchasing our Tara, was exceptional! First, Irene and I spoke multiple times before we decided to travel out to meet her and Tara. We wanted a trained dog and luckily Irene had a perfect two year old for us.  I had done a lot of research, and Irene’s knowledge of the breed was outstanding... it totally set her apart! We were so impressed with the kennels, staff, and facilities at Ruidoso Malinois! Irene took time to throughly describe the background of the breed and explained in detail the requirements that owning a Belgian Malinois would entail. Irene invests her heart and soul in her dogs and she wants them all to have the very best life. My daughter instantly fell in love with Tara and the feeling was mutual! We returned six weeks later for training and Tara has been a wonderful addition to our family ever since! Honestly, we have never seen a dog bond with a person as quickly as Tara did with my daughter! From day one she was her girl! Irene and I have kept in touch and she is truly one of the most kind hearted dog lovers I have ever met! If I could... I would give Irene a million stars! Irene Howcroft is an expert and we would highly recommend anyone considering adding a Belgian Malinois to their family to contact Irene and visit her kennel! We could not be happier with our entire experience with Irene and our Tara is everything we hoped for and more!
i have poor time with this woman for a dog. she was bad and never good when we want dog much rude

First of all, I would like to state that I have had a wonderful experience in purchasing my beautiful Lucianna from Irene / Ruidoso Malinois. I have owned a Malinois Family Protection Dog in the past but found my experience with her kennel to be far superior. I first began speaking with Irene about a dog in October 2018 and was amazed at her knowledge, willingness to take the time to fully answer my endless questions, and caring to kindly respond to my more ignorant moments. Over the months I have spoken with many client references from people who have purchased both puppies as well as fully trained Protection & Working dogs. The response from the people I spoke with was universally “over the moon” with their “members of the family” or in the case of working dogs, their Partner. I have had the opportunity to visit the Ruidoso facility on several occasions. The first was to meet and feel comfortable with the kennel and on the second occasion to go through the 5 day handler training that comes with every protection dog. The kennel was extremely clean, well maintained and healthy, and great for raising and training dogs and puppies.  Puppies are initially raised in the house with Irene, and at 10 weeks the puppies have their 2nd set of inoculations and move outside to big group pens so they can experience the outside while being located just outside the front door so they have close supervision by Irene and her staff. The adult dogs have outside pens (many bigger than my backyard!). The business aspects of the purchase of my dog were very clearly stated with regard to both the non-transfer of breeding rights and health warranties and workability of my dog. I was given copies of all X-rays and health certificates of Lucianna. I understood the breeding restrictions as I do not support the “backyard” breeding of these top bloodlines either. Great care should be taken to preserve and protect dogs of this quality and capability. In my view, all aspects of the “business side” of the transaction were straightforward, clear and in all aspects, transparent. Simple. In summary, I feel fortunate to have found Ruidoso Malinois, have been able to learn from Irene and most importantly to have found Lucianna, a wonderful protection companion to spend my future years loving. Secondly,….. I find several aspects of the negative communications on the Ruidioso Malinois Facebook page and Trust Pilot review to be very sad. First and foremost is the death of a well loved dog. I think we can all understand Mr Pancroft’s  grief. Secondly, I find Mr Pancroft’s focus on Ruidoso Malinois  to vent his grief sad as well. This is clearly the result of vindictive intent. I have studied the communications between his troll (Ani Austin) on the Ruidoso Facebook page as well as the numerous edits he has been making to his negative review (making it more and more negative with each edit) on Trustpilot and find them to be a clear and concerted effort to demean the reputation of a quality breeder and trainer that has provided so many dogs that have brought such joy and/or protection to many families and people. To readers of this message, if you have any doubts about Ruidoso, either review the facebook communications or simply call Irene at Ruidoso and talk to her. Also, review the Ruidoso Malinois Website. It is very informative and transparent with regard to all aspects of it’s business as well as the Malinois breed. Andrew is an ex employee / consultant to Ruidoso who seems to have an axe to grind. As an “imagine & reputation” expert consultant on the internet, it would seem that he is simply using his skills to attack Ruidoso Malinois. To Andrew, this is becoming silly and mean spirited. I doubt this is who you are trying to be. Lets all love your dog, and wish you the all the best with your new/future family member. To end this review, I would just like to state how happy I am to be working with Ruidoso Malinois, in fact while at my Handler’s school I fell in love with another puppy. I may well end up with TWO dogs by the middle of this summer.

Great facility!  Conditions for working dog housing could not be better. Well thought out kennels in an open mountain air setting. Gorgeous dogs!  Irene knows her stuff!  Understanding both mind and body to create a balanced sound K9!

For anyone who is wanting to get a Belgian Malinois I full recommend Ruidoso Malinois and Irene. I have a German Shephard that I bought hoping he would be a good service dog for me because of my PTSD and anxiety, I recently had to retire him due to his anxiety with being in crowded places. Because of my anxiety and what I have been through its hard for me to go out and not feel terrified. After finding Irene and her kennel online and talking with other people who have the breed I was excited to get the call back from Irene. After telling her about my family and what I have been through she told me she had the perfect Belgian for me, and she was right. My fiancée and I made the drive to her kennel from Utah and when we got there we were greeted by one of her trainers and a couple of her puppies. I was nervous because the only dog I have ever had a strong bond with was my great pyreneese. I was hoping to have that same bond with the female she picked for me. When I met ketty it was love at first sight and she new that she had found her family. Words can not describe the connection we have. Irene was right when she said she had the perfect dog for me. I pick ketty up next month and I can not wait to have her home. Irene has kept me posted on her progress and sends me pictures of her weekly. Again I fully recommend Irene and her kennel for anyone looking at getting a Belgian malinois.

Where to begin...first...we purchased our boy from this breeder. The experience with the breeder notwithstanding, we could not have asked for a better dog! He was the most loyal and just absolutely biggest joy of our life! Recently, at just over two years old, we unexpectedly lost our boy, we are absolutely devastated!!! I am trying my best to live my life in honor of our boy and be the person he always believed me to be. That said, I feel it important to share our experience with this breeder. After having provided a deposit, I arrived to pick up our boy. This was our first foray into dogs and after having gotten our pup, people we ended up meeting informed us of concerns with a Ruidoso Malinois. Aside from the litany of negative online reviews, more about the breeder than the dogs, we were told that a legit Malinois breeder would have never given us a dog without having ever met us, learned of our lifestyle, housing and work arrangements. It is now my understanding that these are areas a legitimate breeder would have interest so that the dog doesn’t end up in a bad environment, abused or in a shelter! You will likely discover, as she seems to have a history of doing, a sudden increase in positive reviews on this and other pages reviewing Ruidoso Malinois. Kudos for her ability to rally the troops to attempt to push down the negative experience(s) of those she has injured. She DEF is savvy and posses skills in this regard!! But, end of the day, none of these people have any idea of what our experience was with this breeder, aside from the clipped and edited texts she’s seen fit to post. But, again, kudos to her for pulling them together to bash us and our post based solely on her request! If they wish to post their experience, that’s great. But, to assume they know our experience...meh At any rate, I arrived to pick up our boy, video in hand to record the exciting event, as most people do these days! I was approximately 30 minutes early and was approached by a VERY dirty, nice, but VERY dirty young girl wearing hip waders stained to the knees with dog crap. She told me the breeder refused to come out and meet me because I was early - after driving from Denver, I just wanted to conduct my business and get on the road home. Well, I received a number of texts messages, followed by a call from the breeder and as she went on a tirade asking why I was early, she accused me of trying to spy on her...paranoid much? Given her attitude, I told her that I would be happy to just accept a refund and be on my way. She advised me there are no refunds and I "Have to accept my dog or forfeit deposit". Once I returned, upon arriving at the breeders house, I was overwhelmed with the pungent smell of dog poo!!! Walking up the short dirt drive, I passed three makeshift wire fence pens, each circling a tree and each containing a single dog going pretty much batshit crazy, as I have since learned Malinois do when they are penned up with no attention. There was also an out building about 50 yards from the house which seemed to house 20 or so barking adult dogs, the pens seemed to be..."overflow". As I approached the house, I found another three makeshift pens, which contained a number of pups living or at least in dirt and poo, old, dirty toys, etc. In total, there were probably 40-60 pups on the ground. At the time, being new to the dog world, I thought this to be the norm. I've since been told...not so much. What we've described to other breeders, and showing them the video I took when picking up our boy, we're told these conditions are "Deplorable" and, "The epitome of a puppy mill". Fast forward to our dog's second year...he was titled as per our contract and we inquired about breeding. We were put off, made promises, all of which were never followed thru on. Last brush-off would have been in Nov. '18 when she advised she would reply in a week due to out-of-town family. Never heard back, even after reaching out! After having lost our boy, reputable breeders we spoke with suggested that the breeder of our dog may have known he had potential health issues, which could explain why she refused to allow us any breeding rights - she also failed to provide us with health certs of the sire or dam, which I am told is a HUGE red flag! Irene Howcroft has been pretty ugly this entire time! She has responded to others who have made negative posts about her by randomly blasting their employer (attempting to jeopardize their employment by doing so, then claiming THEY are seeking revenge against her!!??) and personal phone number(s) of those who have posted negatively about Ruidoso Malinois. Without fail, she refers to everyone as a liar and suggests there is some conspiracy against her. Always posting some protracted reply making note of how stellar her business is, but fails to touch on the points where she is deficient - there are a number! You will also find that she has an astonishing number of positive reviews after any negative review(s) as she does rally friends to post and attack those who post negative experience(s). And while these people may have had good experience, this doesn’t make others poor experience any less valid or relevant!! The internal struggle I suffer with is NOT having been able to breed our boy, but did she know of health issues that we may have been able to address and perhaps extend the life of this majestic creature!? The vet initially suggested that he may have suffered a heart attack, but the vet who performed the necropsy informed us that at leas than three years old and 50 ft from the car on a walk in the park, something, “more sinister” is likely. And, in fact a congenital disorder was found. If you research, you will find a court matter related to this breeder. And, while the case(s) was/were indeed "dropped" it wasn't that there was a prevailing trial, but that the municipal offices that conducted this enforcement operated outside of their jurisdiction, literally by approx. 100 yards! She was awarded damages due to the authorities operating outside of their jurisdiction...there was nothing indicating their accusations were untrue. In fact, our dog had worms and giardia when he went to the vet the day we got him home - you can discover online about her dogs being seized and her response to the accusation(s) of her dogs health. She acknowledges her dogs were indeed in treatment for giardia. I was told that dogs in treatment should not leave the breeder so as to prevent infecting other dogs as well as ensuring the dogs are in good health prior to being homes - again, our dog came to us with giardia and worms. In all fairness, I have again been advised worms can be pretty normal with pups. The breeder also claims that is normal with all puppies...perhaps. But, neither of our dogs since came to us with either affliction! Also, the people who this breeder sued and "prevailed" were all pretty much those who worked for her, at one time or another, for Minimum wage. They failed to respond as most of them were/are unable to afford counsel...the cases were pretty much all default/fail to answer the complaint...people were unable to afford counsel to answer the suit. This breeder advised us that her seizure of her dogs cost her a contract of 160 dogs to the State of New Mexico (Her claim in an online news article) and probably another 200 sales of dogs, all to have happened in a single year...360 dogs in a year??? You do the math!! We currently struggle with the decision to bring another dog into our family, but have spoken with a number of breeders and have decided that we are a good family and that we provide a great life for our four-legged family members - each had something negative to say about Ruidoso Malinois! And, while I understand people have grudges or whatever, if a number of people all seem to suggest similar problems with this breeder, there must to some validity with their claims!? So, while our lost boy was wonderful in EVERY way, we do not attribute any of that to this breeder! She will claim how she spent so much time choosing the right dog for us, she never met us and asked minimal questions of us. Each dog since, we've had to complete an evaluation for suitability. We miss him terribly and hope nobody ever has to experience what we have, witnessing this young and beautiful creature...our beloved family member take his last breath at such a young age!! End of the day...if there are enough people making negative assertions, it’s likely at least some of them are true. This woman calls everyone a liar or likely a jealous competitor! Why take a chance with a puppy mill, with a negative history when there are so many reputable breeders which have 100% positive reviews and flawless history!!!
Over the years I've purchased four (4) puppies  from Irene.  Every one grew into exactly what she had promised.  Could not be happier.

Cynthia, What does "this woman is crazy" even mean? How many years have you known her personally? That is an utterly slanderous unfounded statement. Irene operates an outstanding kennel, is dedicated, passionate and protective of the Belgian Malinois  breed. She is considered an of the experts in the field, instructs law enforcement, provides outstanding dogs to civilians, security companies and enforcement agencies. She is highly respected for being  ethical, professional, articulate and educated. Your statement is ridiculous and insulting.
This woman is crazy.  Wether she sells good dogs or not is beside the point for me.

If you are looking for a real working Belgian Malinois (Belgian Shepard) then this is the kennel you want to buy from! Irene is the owner/trainer. I have purchased two Mali's from her and in the process of getting a third. From great puppies, to full blown trained and working dogs for police, K9, patrol, personal protection, drugs, fire departments, etc.. Her Mali's have even been in the movies! See her website. She sells to municipalities, state, and federal governments and qualified individuals. Don't be fooled by puppy mills or private breeders. Her dogs are the BEST of the BEST and Malinois's are the greatest dogs on earth. Ask any police officer, soldier or professional trainer. Great dogs from a great kennel that deals in Mali's ONLY! At least 10 stars! My profile photo is my two Mali's- Sam and Liz. :-)
We all love @simplepetlove! Their calendar is wonderful. Filled with tons of furry friends!

Simple Pet Love has been one of the first followers we had on Instagram 3 years ago and we love the bunch of people that are behind the scenes. They do a lot for other pets, animals & environment. We purchased our Simple Pet Love calendar from them this year & couldn't be happier. They even published our pup in December section.

We've been following Simple Pet Love for a while now on Instagram. They are a genuine, kind and a very caring community. Always spreading and sharing the love, you truly feel like part of a family. We purchased two calendars to support our furriends and contribute to a great cause. We love you guys, keep being pawsome😘 Much love, Jenny & Albert xo
Simple Pet Love is the BEST!!! Finally there is a community where pet lovers of all kinds can share in their love of pets!

Fabulous products - the harnesses last for years with every day use.  The Quick Fit harness is a particular favourite as it just pops over the dog's head and does up with one clip. This order was delivered less than 24 hours after I placed it - amazing customer service.

We use the ezydog harness’ for our pug. They are easy to put on, are comfortable and love the colour choices! Sometimes he pulls on the lead but he has never escaped from the harness and is comfortable for him ! We also have the ezydog life jacket which has helped him gain confidence in the water!

Received today the collar I ordered less than 24 hours ago. I ordered this as a replica of the one my dog was wearing when he came to us 4 years ago. It has lasted all this time & would probably have lasted even longer but the “ check” part was sticking. I’ve never known a dog collar last so long- with constant use- & would highly recommend the brand, Brilliant service- thank you. Marge
Our X2 buoyancy aid was tested the day it arrived and kept our retriever level in the water where previously his rear end had been sinking. Great product and easy to put on / remove. Thank you

I’ve edited my review as having initially left a negative review outlining the issues I’d had with my order I was contacted really quickly by Angela at EzyDog to resolve it and I’m happy with how things have turned out. All things considered I’d use the shop again as I like their products, shipping was quick and communication (when I was speaking or emailing directly) was quick and helpful too!

This is the 4th EzyDog collar & lead I have purchased, not because they don’t last, quite the opposite, I just love the different colours! They are hard wearing and great value for money. My large lab can pull at times (especially if he sees a pavement snack!) and I feel 100% confident that the collar will not break. Great customer service. Would highly recommend.

Literally the best harness ever. Minimum of x2 30mins walk, every day... stubborn lead pulling 32kg chow chow at the helm.... Only just replaced now for the first time in 9 years as neck part starting to fray. Wouldn’t have bothered if he didn’t put all his weight behind him refusing to come out of the park. I hope my baby out lasts this harness. Exceptional quality in this day and age!!!

These lights are amazingly robust as well as literally brilliant. I lost one last October from the dog's collar.  Yesterday,  ie,  a whole winter later I found it again under a field gate in mud on whilst on one of our regular walks.  And it still works without even having to change the battery! We have them on the dogs' collars,  our rucsac and our winter jackets. Can't be faulted for robustness,  durability and visibility -literally brilliant.

Our absolute favorite one stop shop for all things Doggy (& human) accessories! Could not recommend this business enough! 5 star customer service with fast delivery and all handmade products are of the highest quality! Wuflove are constantly coming up with new designs and also offer a wide range of personalized items. I have even approached them for a few custom orders and nothing has been too much trouble...and everything I have received has surpassed my expectations!
Great products, super quick delivery every time I’ve ordered with great communication. The products are of a very high quality and all handmade. Highly recommended.
Fantastic service, I worked with Helen on a project and it was very smooth, professional and personable as well!  Would definitely recommend Wuf Love.
Beautiful bespoke dog collar and lead excellent personal service
Super quick and friendly service and a great product would recommend and will use again.
Great items Fast delivery Fare prices
Love the savings, love the easy website and ordering, love the quickness of delivery!  TY

I am very happy so far with the products and service from Pet Bucket. It's a great alternative that was recommended to me by someone in the veterinarian business. My vet's office is so horrible at getting things done, at least I know I have control over getting products when I need them. Thanks for your service!
Awesome customer service, selection, and prices.

Do not purchase through Petbucket.com they take extra money out of the account you charge with and then claim they have no idea what you're talking about. I physically see the unauthorized charge on my bank statement. Also I never even received the product after a month I demanded a full refund and of course they won't return the extra money they charged 4/16/19 after the authorized flea treatment charge. My bank is filling a fraudulent charge! Buy products for your pets at your local vet offices to avoid the extra bs by only spending a few bucks more.
Free and "fast" shipping my butt. 14 days after I ordered Nexgard for my dog, the Post Office still doesn't have my order. Ridiculous.

I would like to express my thanks to Pet Bucket for providing such great values on needed products. We have a growing Cattery with a large Great Pyrenees for herding our sheep, ducks and yes, our cats! And she brings in fleas to our long hair Persians!. I recently got advice from another Cattery that the Pet Shed had better prices and upon checking it out found that with your free shipping you beat even them!  I was so glad!  Thank you again!
This service is just great! I never have to think about when to give our dog her meds. They come right to our door at the right time to give them to her. Makes my life a little easier!

A really good price and overall customer service for top quality products. I bought Frontline Plus and so far I’ve seen no bad side effects and I used the product on both my dogs, one is 12 months other is 9. Much better than the Raid Exterminators I was using before which did nothing and my dog still got fleas.
Excellent communication and products. Nothing expired or fake. Best prices anywhere on the internet for genuine quality products. Much cheaper than your local veterinarian.

I guess I'll be the first to comment on this. I have ordered a product from this place now two times. Revolution Brown Dogs 10-20lbs (5-10kg) - 6 Pack @ $60.95. This is a good price considering where I"m from its around $20 a tube. So it does save me some money. The product also seems to work really well. The only complaint I have is that when you order it from the United States it takes forever to receive it because it is all the way in the United Kingdom. It gets shipped out in about 3 business day's but, its been two weeks and I still haven't received it. It could take up to 4 weeks (20 business days). So, in a nutshell, order a month in advance and you'll be fine! ;)

I always trust this place. Very experienced and professional. These people know what they are doing and they are doing it outstanding. If you are hesitant about this business, don't be! You'll find a good friend in dog training.

I came for basic obedience training. I wanted to train my dog and learn how to train my dog. I purchased 10 individual classes at their facility. At each training class, the trainer spent half the time training my dog and the other half was spent teaching me how to train my dog. Overall, it went great. I was able to schedule appointments easily every time. I had two different trainers, they both were great. I would recommend this place to anyone!

My girls (35lb and 100lb) tolerate, but don't like being bathed in the shower. And they are way too big for a tub or sink or anything like that. So when I came across the booster bath, it was a "dream" product for me. I purchased mine 22 months prior to the writing of this review and, upon receiving it, genuinely loved it. And although the girls didn't really love being bathed in the booster bath either, it seemed to be a huge improvement in their eyes, as it certainly was in mine! No more leaning down for an hour to finish with back pain. No more wet dogs running around my bedroom after a bath. And cleaner dogs overall - with them elevated and tethered at waist height, I was much more easily able to clean their bellies, heads and necks, and leave conditioner in for the recommended time instead of rushing to get them out of the shower. On the whole, I was a very happy camper. But after each bath, the leash restraints seemed to get more fragile and weathered. I imagine this is because they are left wet after each bath, though I don't really know. All I knew for sure is that they would break sooner rather than later - and after the 21st month, they did. No biggie, I figured. I'll order a new one. I knew it would be out of warranty, but it seemed fine, since I loved the product so much. I had a little trouble figuring out where to order, and after a while I sent an email to Booster Bath customer service. They responded first thing the next morning, another good sign. Then the problem cropped up: you cannot actually order just a leash restraint. You must order the entire parts bag! This meant I had to pay $36 for a single broken strap - about 25% of what I paid for the product, and an order that from my experience so far is likely to placed every year and a half to two years. It also means a ton of material waste - I'll be throwing out everything in the bag except the leash restraint. So essentially, you have a great product and responsive customer service, but a product that will regularly break and require expensive replacement parts, plus material waste, and a generally flawed customer service policy. I'd give the product's functionality like 6*. Customer service response time is 4* (my second email took 2 days to receive an answer). But durability is 3*, and replacement part cost is zero stars (again, $36 for a single 12 inch length of cloth is downright abusive!). Average it out, you get a 3* product.

Someone should have noticed that the order had not gone out and was more than a week past the ship date.  I will be looking for a new online pet supplier as my pet can't afford to miss meds as she has due to this issue.

I ordered a dog dematting comb.  It arrived & I hated it.  I left a review on Chewy.com on the product & the next day Chewy contacted me privately & apologized for my experience.  They even offered me a refund & told me to give the comb to a shelter.  I never asked for a refund.  They offered it.  I switched to chewy from Petco & I am so glad that I did!!

We have been Chewy customers for years and have never been disappointed!  Only once, has there been a toy forgotten, and within minutes the customer service representatives had it overnight shipped for us!  After communicating with a couple of different reps, and sharing pictures of our fur babies, all was well!  A couple of weeks later, I received the sweetest card, and hand painted picture of my fur baby!  It absolutely made my day!!  Chewy employees and customer service for the win!

Chewy customer service is amazing, they are so caring and thoughtful. I had ordered some glucosamine tablets on Friday, my best bud of 12 years passed on Sunday.  I emailed them Monday saying I wouldn't need the tablets, they responded in less than an hour, saying they would refund my money, and I should donate to a doggy in need. This Thursday I received a glass vase with white daisies and pink carnations and a note from Elizabeth at chewy.com It made me feel special, in what a tough week it has been without my best bud Rocky

i bet i have spent 3 thousand plus with chewy with little problem. well that changed tonight. tried to ordered around 15 cases of alpo wet dog food and with 6 dogs i really don't like to change up, but anyways i called to find out why all of the wet food i was trying to order was all out of stock and i thought to myself your a pet supplier company how do you run out?! so the nice young person told me just call back in a couple weeks and will check on it for you..... um ok he told me yeh warehouse let us know they were out so we ordered more?? so why did you wait till you were out???  i have given chewy a few chances but that was my last. i'll pay the extra i guess as long as i can have it when i need it. chewy you need to make some changes! never again will you get a dime out of me! amazon or walmart.. to tell a customer give us a shout in a couple weeks! really!! absolute joke chewy!

I would like to thank Chewy for going above and beyond for my mom and her kitty Joey.  Joey was on a specialized diet for kidney and liver problems.  Sadly, Joey crossed the Rainbow Bridge on Tuesday, October 22, 2019.  Later the same day, his special food was delivered as previously scheduled. Chewy refunded the purchase and did not ask for the product to be returned; she can now donate the special food to other special kitties at a shelter or veterinarian of her choosing. But wait - There's more!  Today, my mom received a beautiful bouquet of flowers in honor of Joey. I would like to thank Chewy and their employees for the kindness and compassion extended to my mom.  Thank you for caring for your customers in such a generous way.

I rarely ever write reviews but I just have to for Chewy. I have been ordering from Chewy for the past two years and have them on autoship every month for dog food and treats. Hands down the best customer service ever. If I ever had any issues with anything, they ALWAYS fix it and are so nice about it. A dog costume I bought didn’t fit right and I wanted to exchange it for a different size. I called so I can return the one I got and they told me to donate it to a shelter and they’ll order me a new one for free. The one I wanted didn’t come in a bigger size so the guy stayed on the phone with me for 5 more minutes looking through the site to help me choose something else I might like instead. He was funny and nice! A package I ordered said it was delivered by Fedex and we never received it. I called Chewy in a panic and they said it was no problem, they’ll send me out a new one (at no cost to me) as soon as possible. Couldn’t get any better. Thanks Chewy.
I don't think I have ever had such a great customer service experience on the phone.

We bought the monthly bark box.  I explained we have two Doberman Pinchers who are very fierce chewers. Within 2 minutes my oldest dog had a piece of a toy in the back of his throat.   This was their super chewer or whatever they call it toy box.   Very scary.  I wrote and sent pictures of broken toy and asked for refund.  I was horrified when they sent another box today.   Seriously?  Take responsibility and own up to your reputation and keep pets safe.

We have been using chewy for about 4 years now.  We started when our dog went on prescription diabetic dog food.  They have fast shipment, and friendly customer service.  When my beloved dog died, I called them up to return the food.  The man said don’t worry and to donate in my dog’s name.   They also sent me flowers and I was extremely touched.  I highly recommended them.

Chewy is HANDS DOWN the greatest pet supply company I have ever had the pleasure of purchasing from. Their customer service is beyond amazing, making each return and purchase as seamless as possible. I purchased a product for my dog back in June (JUNE!!!! It is currently October) and didn't go to use it until now. I realized I purchased the wrong item for his weight. Instead of sending the product back or making me pay a return fee, etc. - Meagan processed my refund, gave me FREE shipping for my replacement, and told me to donate the incorrect item to my local shelter instead of sending it back. I'm honestly speechless. Unrelated, they also sent my dog a birthday card on his birthday. I really appreciate such a caring business and will continue to only purchase my pet products from them.
Amazing prices and even better customer service!

Best Customer Service - A week ago today I called Chewy because the third shipment of my cats veterinary prescribed food had arrived and I was reluctant to even open the box, because my 2 cats didn’t like the flavor anymore and stopped eating. The representative at Chewy was so courteous and helpful- she refunded the order and help me pick out a new food flavor with the same skin and stomach requirements. Now they are eating again and I am so relieved. I am so happy I called Chewy – they are the best.

If I could give them no stars I would! Every thing is shipped in one giant box. The order I just received was 55lbs! I cannot lift without injury, nor can i move or drag the box in. Contacted Chewy and they said nothing they can do about it. They can do a box up to 68 lbs!!! Seriously??? They will not ship in smaller boxes. So I guess we can all sue them in small claims court when becoming injured trying to lift box. I will buy my cat food and toys etc on Amazon who has same prices as chewy and ships free with prime and you do not have to do a huge order just to get free shipping.

Houndstar designed a coat, collar, lead and toy for our pug. From start to finish the communication was so easy and helpful! The end results were just so beautiful. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend or buy from Houndstar again. Wonderful little company!

Very pleased, a tailored experience that is worth the wait. The quality is exceptional and on the face of it the coat I ordered looks and feels as if it will last a lifetime. The lead and collar are equally high quality and again have the feel of a long lasting well made product.

I’ve had 2 cats cared for under Queens Park Vets, they’ve both had long term conditions and have recieved excellent care and treatment. All the staff are very friendly, reassuring and comforting, especially when I’ve been given upsetting news. I can not recommend their services enough :)

The care and compassion from all staff is second to none.  They all know our pets by name and know their characteristics.  When our dog went missing they helped by placing the details on their social media page and also keeping a look out themselves.  When we had to sadly make the decision to put our previous dog to sleep, they were brilliant with our pet aswell as with us.  Thank you to everyone for everything and whilst we have a pet, we will be a customer of Queens Park Veterinary Surgery

I HAVE 5 PETS ,2 DOGS AND 3 CATS.. (CATS ALL COURTESY OF QUEENS PARK VETS.. AS THEY WERE ALL STRAYS AND SOME WERE INJURED. BUT THE TEAM MENDED THEM, NEUTERED WHERE NECESSARY , VACCINATED AND MICROCHIPPED THEM..THEY DIDN'T SEND THEM TO THE SHELTER..) I SPEND QUITE A FEW HOURS AT QUEENS PARK VETS EACH MONTH AND THEY ARE ALL BRILLIANT.. CANT PRAISE ENOUGH FOR CARE, COMPASSION AND UNDERSTANDING...CAN PHONE FOR ADVICE...TRULY A BRILLIANT PRACTICE..
Very happy with service provided by QuickPam team. Excellent attitude from the beginning till the end - great updates during the journey. Appropriate pricing. Peter & Lenka

Transport pets from SK/CZ to UK/IE Absolutely fantastic service, staff is highly skilled and experienced, they take care of your pet during whole journey, every 4 hrs stop and check, walk out and/or feed, twice per day(!) let you know via fb message or sms in details about your pet how it's going and conditions, and you know where they are and when they arrive. Not cheap, but of course, for such service and support they provided is absolutely adequate.

Not particularly happy with the service from your customer service team. Having explained the situation and problem with product I purchased, getting short snappy answers. Wouldn’t mind but your products aren’t exactly cheap. Definitely won’t be buying again.
Good quality product and efficient delivery service .. will defo purchase from them again
Good quality products with great customer service. Prompt delivery too!
Received my order next day, love the products and my cat loves the treats!
Excellent quality products and great service  - would highly recommend
Good reliable service,i would recommend.

I rate this company with 5 stars because of the efficiency and great price for the CANINE PROTEIN BUILDER - 454g C$22.00. Utopia Hemp provides my dogs with a protein builder second to none. I know that protein is one of the most essential parts of their nutrition and is often underrepresented in many feeds.  Hemp protein is one of the most easily digested fibres on the market, which can increase lean muscle mass and contains healthy fats. Utopia hemp is the best for its canine products, in particular: CANINE OIL OMEGA - 237ml. C$20.00. Adding an oil component to my dog's diet is highly beneficial.  What makes Utopia Hemp's Canine Omni - Oil Omega such a superfood is the high content of essential fatty acids and the correct ration of omega-3-6-9 and GLA.  Oil Omega is 100% natural cold pressed hemp seed oil and is highly beneficial to dogs of all ages. Purchase the oil or protein wholesale or retail. info @ utopia hemp dot com.

Amazing Girl Friday is truly amazing.  Whether it’s arranging cleaning, getting quotes from contractors, letting builders in or dog walking AGF has come to our rescue.  When our elderly dog needed extra care with regular medications and dog walks in her stroller AGF stepped up to the role.  AGF is reliable, efficient and reasonably priced. We couldn’t do without her.

I have hired Lucky Grenier on one occasion to take care of my cat while we vacation. He has done an outstanding job and great piece of mind, he sends us everyday videos, texts and photo's. Definitely recommend him, he is reliable and has a great work, I highly recommend his services.

I don't review much online but I'm so happy my puppy looks amazing in her collar. I bought the yellow spotty one and it came within 6 days and is the best quality - thanks so much for all the customer service!

My blanket came and was printed the wrong way so part of my pets names were cut off. Before I could say anything I received an E-mail from them letting me now that they knew there was a mistake and a new blanket had already been made and was on the way. I was so pleased with their service. My blanket is so soft and comfortable too! I would strongly recommend this company.

I ordered this blanket for my best friend who’s dog is his entire world. He lives far away and I found out after I ordered that I was going to be able to see him! Furbaby Prints was very quick to answer my questions and offered the fastest service and shipping they could. A beautiful blanket; they nailed it! I can’t wait to give it to him ❤️
Their subscription boxes are great, my labrador loves them!
For the past 3 years TLC has been taking care of my dog Tucker. I love their service. They take such good care of my baby. I never worry when I go away!
Great company

Horrible customer service. I received my first and my last box. prior to receiving this box I spoke on the phone with an agent and explained what I needed.  I explained my 4 month Maltese is a teacup 4.8 lbs and teething. I explained she needs size appropriate toys and rawhide bones what I received was a toy with a tennis ball attached to it that is too big for my tiny puppy when I told them how Upset I was and sent them my YouTube video review which I did between pupjoy and barkbox. Barkbox scored a 4 because my puppy found their toys more engaging. Pupjoy scored a 1 because for $31 I received two lame toys one was too big not one chew bone or rawhide. After I sent them my review they emailed me back So sorry Zoe didn't like her box will cancel your subscription you should take her to the store and pick out her bo es and toys. Nowhere did they ask what can we do to make you and Zoe happy. They didn't even try. To chat with one of their agents is close to impossible lucky for me I had their email But after that rude response I have no interest in remaining a customer I gave them 1 star poor customer service worthless toys.Barkbox scored a 4 and I have 0 doubt Pupbox will also surpass Pupjoy

I ran across this subscription box randomly one day and decided to try it. I signed up for the 3 month plan. Ordering was easy and they are quick to confirm with you.  My first order was sent very quickly.  It was super fun to receive a mystery box for my dogs.  I ended up with a nice plush toy, a leash, 2 different kinds of treats, and an antler chew.  The leash and all toys have already gotten a lot of use. I have only opened one of the two treats and 2 out of 3 of my dogs really enjoys them- the other one is just picky in general.  this box is a little more expensive than some of the other ones out there, but not a lot and I did feel the value of my box was more than I paid. I do recommend this company.

I LOVE PupJoy's dog box subscription service. So much better than other competitors (including BarkBox) in so many ways! All natural products, locally sourced, convenience, supports other small businesses, this company is just the best! They have so many options to fit your pups specific wants and needs. Not to mention, the customer service is the best I've come across. Can not say enough good about this service.

Ordering from PupJoy has been such a positive experience for us. When our box arrives the dogs know that it's something special for them and they get so excited! Customer service is top notch...they definitely are a company that has it together. I enjoyed hosting a PupJoy party in my home and receiving Pup points from it. It's a great system they have worked out. I recommend this company to all, they definitely have something for everyone!

Every month I get great products that are perfect for my puppy. This month I got really high value stuff that my puppy LOVED. A squeaky toy that only my puppy can hear?! Thank god for pupjoy! I love reading the entire training/life stage card. They really get me and help make me feel better about puppy frustrations. It's the best box out there and I've seen A LOT.
The treats are great, but the toys don't last long with our inquisitive dogs. The toys don't seem to make it through the first play session.

❤️ The opportunity to receive monthly items to spoil our dog without taking a hit in the wallet. Our pup has thoroughly enjoyed almost every product that has been shipped. Honey looks forward to her monthly shipment !

My dogs know the PupJoy box when I bring it in from the mail!  They can't wait for me to open the box!  I have been very pleased with everything, except for one thing.  I received a treat for them that was not manufactured in the US.  I never allow my dogs any food/treat items that are not made in the US.  If it hadn't been for this one item, I would have given them 5 stars!  PupJoy is worth getting for your dog!!
Pupjoy is a great service. Our little family members are excited every time they see the box coming in!
Excellent products and a business with fantastic customer service - love the concept and the fun of receiving our boxes from PupJoy!

PupJoy has the most customizable boxes of any other company I have seen thus far, combined with the fact that their customer service team is amazing makes for one great company! However, they received a 3/5 because I do think their toy only boxes are a little lacking, the antler was tiny, the every day toys are often rubber or another hard plastic thats easily destroyed. Their saving grace is that usually theres one great toy and a pretty cool "accessory" in the box as well but considering that theres only 3 toys total I have been disappointed in the quality and type of toy. As far as companies that provide toy only boxes I think I'll stay with PupJoy but if I didn't need this option I might be tempted by the larger (and cheaper) boxes of other companies. As I said though their customer service is great, and customization is key! If they were to add some more usable toys (rubber lasts a second before I have to toss it with even the lightest chewers), I would love this company so much more!

We originally had used a competitor but found the quality of the product declined. We decided to try PupJoy and have been very happy with the high quality, focused to our request items we receive. The biggest compliment I can give is that we changed our subscription from a 3 month to a 6 month rolling so as to indicate our happiness with this company John C
PupJoy has so many options and really personalizes your package. So far so good. I look forward to my subscription coming in the mail and so does my pup!

Pupjoy came into our lives while I was reviewing other boxes online due to dissatisfaction with a different brand box. I was looking for more options, higher quality toys, and healthier treats. Pupjoy provides all that and so much more. From the moment you open their Web page you can tell that they are not another gimmicky dog box company. The design and layout of the site is professional, and warm. It is easy to navigate, and you can choose to support a rescue, and they will donate 10% of the box price to them. I love the option to buy single boxes and gift boxes as well. When it comes to options for your pooch, they are the top tier. You get options for types of treats (grain free, organic, allergy sensitive, all natural), toy type (plush, any kind, and tough chewers), size (xsmall, small, medium,  large, xlarge), how many times a year you want a box, gender (make sure to do this because you will get an amazing collar, or collar and leash, set which will be either pink or blue. Easily a 50+ dollar value from Bait Free which works to free bait dogs and rehabilitate them), payment options of every month, 3 months, 6 months, a year. All treats are made by artisan bakers, and small manufacturers, who source, and produce within the USA and Canada. No poor, dangerous products from overseas to worry about here. Also, most all of the toys I have recieved have been usa or Canadian companies and made here. This is NOT something you will ever see with other boxes on a regular basis. The treats are amazing! My dogs favorites have been blueberry cookies, freeze dried beet treats, lemon coconut balls (so pure and good I even ate one and thought about stealing the bag from her!), kale biscuits, and freeze dried bison.  To be honest, she loves them all and turns her nose up at anything store bought. The most refreshing thing is that the toys last!! Even after over three months of hard tug of war, her cow head-double tug plush/rope/squeak toy is still going strong. I get the 'inquisitive' toy option as she is hard on her toys, and I have never been let down. The variety she gets, and I have priced these companies before, along with the cost it would be to buy them at a local pet store, if I could even find them in stock, is many times what I pay per month. If there is a problem with an order, you get immediate response from their Facebook page, and quick response from an email. I recieved a personal email from the CEO Bill Wilkins explaining that he was still waiting for a supplier to come through, and gave me options on how to proceed. We decided to have him send a box of the previous months items along with the new ones he had available, and he even sent me another box that month of the items he was waiting for PLUS some extra goodies for the "inconvenience ". He is personable, and truly cares about his customers. I couldn't be happier with a company, and I wish all companies would treat their customers as well as Pupjoy does. I am a devoted subscriber for life, and my pampered pup is very happy we are. You won't regret subscribing!
Great products and treats that my picky dog loves and can withstand his constant chewing

I really love Pupjoy!  I like that I can choose different options with my monthly box to include all treats or treats with toys and assessories, etc.  Customer service is phenominal.  I needed to call once because I was not receiving e-mail notifications.  Customer service was very helpful, discovered I had typed in my email address incorrectly and fixed the problem.  I would highly recommend Pupjoy!
So far I have received 4 boxes and everytime my 3 dogs love their surprises!

Our dog Chewy is a Cavashon and weighs about 10 pounds - we got him the products associated with a small dog although he is the Pupjoy definition of tea cup.  He loves everything in his box and can't wait for his next one. We also advocate for CatJoy as well!

Just a short note to let you in on a fun event for your pooch.  Have you discovered PupJoy?  Monthly treats and toys custom packaged for your fur baby!  They will have so much fun with exciting toys and tempting snacks!  You really need to give this a try- - -:-)

Great company. great owners. wasnt too sure about customer service but Joey said they are working on it. This is what happens when a company grows too quick lol hard to manage. Everyone, before posting bad reviews, email Joey directly and he will fix it. Provide your feedback directly which can help instead of being rude here :D i understand some shipments take time and its easy to get frustrtated but give them a chance.

Joey and Lulu are amazing people. Give them a chance. They are good people just need some good employees. I ordered a dachshund ramp which arrived on time and everything seems good so far. dog is a happy dude. Will buy frm this company again, cheers.

I got on the phone with the owner and he explained how their company grew so quick over the last few months and that its hard to keep up with orders. Message to owner plzz plzz work on customer service. I like your dog products but most of these negative reviews will chase off future customers. hope u wil fix this soon. Have a good day.
Not sure about these 1-2 star reviews but I was skeptical at first... their support reached out to me and helped me sort out the issues. I am pleased. I think everyone deserves a chance.

No complaints. Either the company is biased towards me lol since I see many negative responses. Their shipment took a lil long but i finally received what i paid for. wanted to take away 1 star but i shall let it pass this time hehe :)
Poor communication. Inaccurate inventory. Two occasions I had to appeal to my credit company. I don't know how this company can exist with terrible services.

I purchase 2 ramps back in July and I have STILL not gotten the product nor will anyone contact me.  After numerous emails, I haven't gotten any response.  I took to Sausage Dog Central's social media platforms and started commenting only to have my comments taken down the next day!!  I started to post again and someone on behalf of Sausage Dog Central asked me to email Breanne.  I did.  3 times now. This place is a joke!  No response to my emails, no phone numbers listed to contact them directly.  I'm upset and out over $300!!!!

I have been waiting for my product for more than a month now. We have emailed a several times but only received 2 replies so far with possibly a wrong tracking number. Since then no reply at all. Owner says they are busy and small business, there is no problem with the small house business, in fact i do support these type of business as long as they do not over promise, and deliver what they promised to deliver such as timeframe. (they emailed me and said give 1 week to get it delivered when item has not even been shipped, and from US to Aus it takes quickest 1 week, so you already know that's not gonna happen). Very disappointed and feels like scammed this way unless there's any justified explanation. --------------------------------------------- Update Since i posted this, owner and two other customer rep staff members got in touch with me and took action quite fast within 24 hours thankfully. We will hopeully soon receive the product for our doggy baby. If you are having a trouble getting back from the support email address, try email alternative email address on their response here to solve the issue as it seems that support email are experiencing a big backlogs. ------------------------------------- Update I am now changing back the review to one star AGAIN. since my last update, i am still waiting for my item and it has not even been shipped out although they have been telling me "a couple of days" then "tomorrow" then today i got message "next week". It looks like the owner has no idea of the timeframe of delivery and order status.

Their ramps are amazing! They come fully assembled and are very easy to use, move and put away if needed. I have one for the couch and I’m buying a second one for the bed. Prevent your dachshunds from the pain of IVDD and surgery. These ramps are not luxury they are a necessity!

If your dog also has IVDD then you know how hard (and expensive) this can be. My doxie has gone through 2 surgeries, and the ramps I purchased from this company have been life savers. Bella loves the ramp and so do I!

Joey and Lulu do a great job with this business. They’re a small company that focuses on quality and customer service. You can tell they care about the product and the customer. Leaving this review to show support for their growing business. And the Ramps are amazing quality. I highly recommend to all my fellow dog owner friends.

I live in Vancouver BC Canada, and ordered a dachshund ramp from Sausage Dog Central - the best thing I could do for my mini doxie. The ramp was delivered on time and it arrived all assembled and ready to be used. A wonderful quality product. I also have purchased a pooch booster car seat - the best!! Sausage Dog Central is a great company with excellent customer care. Get everything doxie from Sausage Dog Central - you won’t be disappointed.
Horrible company!!! You pay for products but only recive 1! Tried to get in contact multiple times and I am just ignored !!! Don’t fall for this scam company!!!!!
Worst company. don’t buy anything from this company
These ramps save our doxie’s back and joints
this harness is cute and so breathable!
The pyjamas are super, after a little problem with the size, my fault problem with the tape measure, exchanged without a problem and received the new size super quick! Thank you

Money was taken from my boyfriends account as he bought me a pair of pyjamas for my 18th birthday. Three months later still no parcel had arrived so we contacted the page via Facebook and our messages were read but not replied too. In the message we provided proof of purchase and proof that money had been taken out of our account but no email after confirming our order and no tracking either and obviously no parcel delivered. I order online all the time and while I understand mistakes happen such as orders not going through properly or parcels getting lost. The fact that it had been three months with no update on the whereabouts of our parcel and that sausage dog central had taken money from our account and didn’t bother to send a confirmation email afterwoods AND THEN didnt reply to our message stating what had happened and that we were very unhappy with there service.. Dreadful will not be purchasing from them again which is such a same because I love to spoil my sausage dogs and they have great products. But they won’t be stealing my money again anytime soon!!

I'm really pleased with the rucksack. Not only does it look great but is is also well made and very practical. I shall be using it to put all of Freddie's essentialsessential in when we are out and about-coat, water,water container etc etc!
Excellent our grand daughter was very pleased with the two sets of Pyjamas she received for Xmas  We will highly recommend  sausagedogcentral.co.uk
It's a decent company but limited range of pets. I have a ferret and there is nothing there for them.
Great products and nice staff! Would shop there again, but not my preferred store.
Wide variety of pet products. My dog loves everything. High quality and great service
These people really seem to care about your pets.  They go the extra mile every time.
Much different stuff for pets (from birds to horses)! Great choice of nutrition. Couldn't find the "weight loss" feeding for my dog anywhere but World of pets!

So far, my experience with this store has been very positive. The staff members are really helpful when it comes to picking the right products for my dog. They really take into account the age, type, size etc. of the dog before recommending products.
My dog loves this place its like he knows when he is going ther

I actually visited one of the stores. The help, advice, and pricing were just as excellent as the service! Recommend to every pet owner. They had no issue with ordering in my selected items and offered a choice of in store collection or delivery to my home the same day they expected it to arrive in store. I couldn't have asked for a better shopping experience. Plenty of options given after I explained what I wanted and no pressure selling to make a bigger order. My items were available the day I was advised they would be and I had a choice to pay upfront or upon delivery/collection.

Terrible! Alaska airlines said that the doctor who signed my document could not be verified. This is the last thing you want happening when you arrive to the airport. I ended up having to rent a car and drive to my destination. Great! Paid for a invalid ESA letter, a flight I didn't take, and a rental car+gas. Super frustrating. Seems like a legit site....NOPE.

Good support service. Helped me in solving problems with my dog.

I'm someone who has pets and my cat wound up being my companion animal. Training them to know their companion is awesome. Mine was an accident but I hope others get the same love and companonship I get from my cat and future service dog

Companion animals, support animals training them , and taking care of them are wonderful wonderful healing tools. They benefit people of all ages, especially for people suffering from mental health issues. Elderly people benefit from having a pet in the house , studies show us that people who have animals ,cats , dogs , etc live longer. in my book anybody that promotes these wonderful animals , and the relationship between them and their people ,is okay in my book .

I believe strongly in pet support because they can't speak and tell us how they feel, are doing or any sort of thing but just giving them the love they want is the best way. I have a cat that is really smart and when he wants love he shows me how much by purring. When I am sick he stays by my side and takes care of me when he hears someone at the door he lets me know. Every morning when I wake up he is there waiting to meow at me like say good morning. When he wants something I tell him  show me and he shows me what he wants. He may not speak it but he shows me because I give him love and support. Animals may feed for themselves but if they could speak I think they would tells us a few things about life.

Pets are the best way to keep us active and happy, my dog is always within arms reach watching out for me. Rocky sleeps beside my bed and as soon as a wake up he stands on the side of the bed to say Good Morning, great way to start a day.
My dog will have he's paper work
